YXpsk:4: nanu ca yogācārabhūmyādiṣu śāstreṣu dharmalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhāritam eveti punas tannirdhāraṇāya yatnavaiyarthyam
YXpsk:6: udghaṭitajñā hi diṅmātreṇa tatsambhavinoviśeṣān niravaśeṣān avaboddhuṃ samarthā iti saṅkṣepoktimeva bahu manyante na vistaroktim
YXpsk:7: ataś ca saṅkṣiptarucisattvānugrahāyedaṃ prakaraṇam ārabdham iti
YXpsk:9: manasikārābhiyuktānāṃ ca pravrajitānām api vistaragranthābhiyogo vikṣepāyaivety ubhayeṣām api dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyartham iha prakaraṇe dharmalakṣaṇaṃ samāsenoktam iti nāsti tadārambhavaiyarthyam
YXpsk:10: athavā saṅkṣepeṇadharmalakṣaṇavyutpannā ayatnena dharmalakṣaṇavistarapratipattisamarthā bhaviṣyantīty ato yogācārabhūmyādīnāṃ vistaragranthānāṃ praveśabhūtam idam ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kṛtamiti
YXpsk:11: kiṃ punar dharmalakṣaṇavyutpattyā vinā na sidhyati yatrācāryo dharmalakṣaṇanirdeśaṃ praty ādriyate
YXpsk:13: tathā hidharmalakṣaṇakṛtaparicayasya sandehābhāvād yatheṣṭam ālambane cittam ekāgrībhavati nānyathā
YXpsk:15: viśāradaś ca sāṅkathyaviniścayeṣu sarvapraśnatadvyākaraṇanirdeśasamartho bhavati nānyathā
YXpsk:18: pañcaiva skandhā na nyūnā adhikā vā
YXpsk:19: ātmātmīyagrāhavastupradarśanārthamprāyeṇa hi bālānāṃvijñāna evātmagrāhaḥ śeṣeṣu rūpādiṣv ātmīyagrāhaḥ
YXpsk:20: tathā hi bāhyādhyātmikasya rūpasya karaṇatvena karmatvena vātmanā sambandha iti rūpaskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
YXpsk:21: śubhāśubhānāṃkarmaṇāṃ vedanā vipākaḥ tāṃ cātmā saṃvedayata iti vedanāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
YXpsk:27: dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣv ātmanaḥ sañjñādvāreṇasaṃvyavahāraḥ pravartata iti sañjñāskandha ātmīyagrāhaḥ
YXpsk:28: kuśalākuśalādiṣu saṃskārair ātmābhimatasya cittasya preraṇātsaṃskāraskandha ātmīyagrāha iti pañcaiva skandhaḥ
YXpsk:34: tathāhy adeśasthām api sañjñādivat pracāraudārikatvād deśaparicchedena tām eva vyapadiśanti na sañjñādīn haste mevedanā śirasi me vedaneti
YXpsk:39: rūpaskandha iti samānādhikaraṇo vā syāt ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣovā
YXpsk:41: yasmāt skandhaśabdo rāśiparyāyavacanaḥ tasmād rāśivatprajñaptisantaḥ skandhā iti
YXpsk:45: sambandhārthā ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī rūpaskandhayor iti rūpād anya eva skandhaḥ prāpnoti
YXpsk:48: abhede 'piṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā tattvānyatvenāvācye ca pratimāyāḥ śarīramrūpasya prāgabhāva iti
YXpsk:53: tathaiva ca skandhārtha iti prajñaptisann ucyate
YXpsk:54: ataś ca tattvānyatvenāvācyatve 'pi svopādānāt ṣaṣṭhī navirudhyate
YXpsk:58: nanu caskandhānāṃ prakṛtatvāt katamad rūpam ity asambaddhaḥpraśnaḥ
YXpsk:59: nāsambaddhaḥ skandhānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāttatsvabhāvavyapadeśena nirdhāraṇam aśakyam kiṃ tarhitadupādānanirdhāraṇenaiveti
YXpsk:60: ato rūpaṃ katamad iti praśnaḥna rūpaskandha iti
YXpsk:61: rūpasya kāryakāraṇabhāvena bhedapradarśanārtham āha catvāri mahābhūtānītyādi
YXpsk:62: tathā hi sarvāṇimahābhūtāni sarvasyopādāyarūpasya kāraṇam sarvaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ sarveṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ kāryam
YXpsk:65: bhūtatvaṃ tu punar eṣāṃ vividhopādāyarūpanirvṛttau tais taiḥ prakārair bhavantīti bhūtāni
YXpsk:66: sarvasattvakarmādhipatyādvānādau saṃsāre na kadācin nābhūvanniti bhūtāni
YXpsk:68: tāni punaś catvāry eva na nyūnādhikāni asāmarthyāpārthakatvaprasaṅgāt
YXpsk:70: tasya caitāvadbhir eva parisamāptatvādanyasya ca karaṇīyasyābhāvāt catvāry eva bhūtāni
YXpsk:71: nanu cadhṛtyādivad avakāśam apy upādāyarūpasya kāryam
YXpsk:75: na hy ākāśaṃ nāma kiñcid asty anyatra sapratigharūpābhāvamātrāt
YXpsk:76: avakāśaṃ ca sapratigham eva vastu svasminn avakāśesapratighasyaiva tasmād apasaraṃ dadāti nākāśam
YXpsk:77: na hitasmāt pradeśād rūpavad ākāśam apasṛtam ititasyāvakāśadānaṃ na yujyate
YXpsk:80: tasmād yatra yasyayasmin saty avakāśābhāvaḥ yasminn asati tasya tatrāvakāśa iti tenaiva tasmāt sthānād apasaratā tasyāvakāśo dattaḥnākāśeneti
YXpsk:82: catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāyeti catvāri ca mahābhūtānirūpaṃ catvāri ca mahābhūtāny upādāya rūpam iti ubhayatrāpicaśabdaḥ sambadhyate
YXpsk:83: pañcaprakāreṇajanananiśrayapratiṣṭhopastambhabṛṃhaṇānāṃ hetubhāvenabhautikaṃbhūtāny upādatta ity upādāyaśabdo hetvarthaḥ tadyathendhanam upādāyāgnir bhavatīti tena nimitteneti gamyate
YXpsk:95: bhūtavat pṛthivīdhātvādayo 'pisvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na vijñāyanta iti punar api praśnaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaityādi
YXpsk:98: khakkhaṭam eva khakkhaṭatvam na hy atra bhāvāntaram asti
YXpsk:105: laghutvaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamānaupādāyarūpasyāpi bhūtatvaṃ prasajyeta
YXpsk:106: īraṇaṃ vāyudhātur ity ucyamāne karmaivāsya nirdiṣṭaṃ syān na svarūpam ity ato 'sya laghutvād upādāyarūpāt karmaṇaś cavyavacchedārtham evam uktaṃ laghusamudīraṇatvaṃ vāyudhātur iti
YXpsk:108: ete ca pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātavaupādāyarūpeṇeva parasparato 'py avinirbhāgavartina iti kathaṃvijñāyate
YXpsk:110: ata eva caiṣāṃ dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhanāni kāritram uktam
YXpsk:111: kathaṃ nāmaiṣāṃ svarūpato 'nupalabhyamānānām api upalādiṣu kāryataḥ sattvam anumīyeteti
YXpsk:112: tathā hy upalādiṣu saṅgrahapaktivyūhanebhyo jalānalānilānāṃpṛthivīdhātunā sāhacaryaṃ vijñāyate
YXpsk:119: saṅgrāhyāpekṣayāpāṃsaṅgrahaḥ karma pākāpekṣayā tejasaḥ paktiḥ karmavardhanīyakalalāṅkurāpekṣayā vyūhanaṃ vāyoḥ karma
YXpsk:121: svabhāvas tusarvānyabhāvanirapekṣa ity ayaṃ karmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya caviśeṣaḥ
YXpsk:123: bhūtānantaroddiṣṭam upādāyarūpaṃ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca na vijñāyata ity ataḥ pṛcchati upādāyarūpaṃ kata
YXpsk:131: varṇālocanād varṇanirbhāsāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvād vā varṇo viṣayo 'syeti varṇaviṣayaḥ
YXpsk:132: ayaṃcātra prasādārthaḥ tadyathā prasanna ādarśa udakapātre vābimbaṃ pratītya tatpratibhāsaṃ pratibimbam utpadyate tadvatpañcasu rūpaprasādātmakeṣu cakṣurādiṣu rūpagandhādīn pratītya tatpratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante
YXpsk:133: atra cakṣurādīnāṃparasparato viṣayarūpātmakāt prasādān manastaḥ śraddhātaś ca vyavacchedaḥ kāryaḥ
YXpsk:134: rūpaprasādātmakatvāviśeṣādvarṇaviṣayatvāviśeṣāc ca ubhayam ucyate varṇaviṣayorūpaprasāda iti ca
YXpsk:138: tad dhi saty api varṇaviṣayatve narūpaprasādātmakam
YXpsk:140: śraddhāpi hi prasādātmikā rūpādiviṣayā cetyato rūpagrahaṇam
YXpsk:141: varṇaviṣayaḥ prasādaś cakṣurindriyam ityucyamāne śraddhāyā api prasaṅga ity ato rūpagrahaṇaṃkriyata iti śraddhāyā arūpātmakatvāt
YXpsk:143: īśanta ity arthaḥ ādhipatyam asmin saṅghātekurvantīty arthaḥ
YXpsk:150: tadyathā vijānātītivijñānam iti prāpte lyuḍartham anādṛtya vijñānam uktaṃtadvyatiriktavijñātṛsaṅgrahavyudāsārtham evamihāpīndriyavyatiriktaliṅgakalpanāvyudāsārtham evam uktaṃsyād iti
YXpsk:151: yathaiva hi cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayiṇāṃ parasparatoviṣayabhedena bheda uktaḥ cakṣurindriyaṃ katamat
YXpsk:154: śabdaviṣayo rūpaprasāda ity evamādi evaṃ rūpādīnām api viṣayāṇāṃ cakṣurādibhir viṣayibhir bhedaucyate
YXpsk:155: cakṣuṣa eva viṣayo rūpam na śrotrādīnāmtadviṣayāṇāṃ śabdāditvena vyavasthānāt
YXpsk:156: atra ca manaso navidhir na pratiṣedho 'prakṛtatvāt
YXpsk:157: evaṃ ca rūpādīnāṃparasparato bheda ukto bhavati cakṣuṣo viṣayo rūpam eva nārūpam iti
YXpsk:158: evam api nīlapītādīnāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāṃcakṣurindriyaviṣayāṇāṃ rūpatvenābheda ukto bhavatīti
YXpsk:159: yadi cakṣurviṣayatvena rūpaṃ viśeṣitam eveti evaṃ sati varṇasaṃsthānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti kimartham
YXpsk:164: abhraṃ dhūmorajo mahikā cchāyātapa āloko 'ndhakāramabhyavakāśaṃnabhaśceti te 'pi kasmād atra noktāḥ
YXpsk:169: navarṇasaṃsthānābhyāṃ pṛthag vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyanta itīhapṛthag noktāḥ
YXpsk:172: saṃsthānaṃdīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalam unnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātamiti
YXpsk:179: yasmādekadiṅmukhapravṛtte bhūyasi varṇādisaṅghātedīrghabuddhir bhavati alpīyasi hrasvabuddhiḥ caturdiśaṃsame vṛttabuddhiḥ sarvataḥ same parimaṇḍalabuddhiḥekadiṅmukhe sātabuddhiḥ nānādiṅmukhe visātabuddhir iti
YXpsk:180: kathaṃ punar etad gamyate varṇādisamudāye dīrghabuddhirbhavati na punar arthāntarabhūte saṃsthāna iti
YXpsk:181: sparśanadvāreṇāpi dīrghādibuddhyutpatteḥ nacendriyāntaraviṣaya indriyāntaradvāreṇa buddhir utpadyate naikendriyavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt
YXpsk:182: naiva tad indriyajñānam kiṃ tarhy anumānajñānamgandhāt puṣpavarṇajñānavat
YXpsk:183: yathāgandhaḥ puṣpavarṇaniyataḥ na tv evaṃ sparśaḥ saṃsthāna iti viṣamo 'yam upanyāsaḥ
YXpsk:184: tasmād ubhayendriyadvāreṇa ghaṭādivad dīrghādisaṃsthānapravṛtteḥ na tad varṇādibhyo'rthāntaram iti
YXpsk:185: na ca niravayavatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ dīrghādirūpeṇa parasparato bhedo yuktaḥ
YXpsk:186: tasmān nanīlādiparamāṇuvad dīrghādiparamāṇavaḥ santīty ataś casaṃsthānaparamāṇusamudāyo 'pi dīrghādisaṃsthānam ityayuktam dīrghādisaṃsthānaparamāṇvabhāvāt
YXpsk:189: sambandhibhedāc catasyāvaśyaṃ bhedena bhavitavyam abhede vātatsambandhīnām apy abhinnatvaprasaṅga iti
YXpsk:190: tasmān nāsty evadravyataḥ saṃsthānamkiṃ tarhi varṇādiṣv eva tathā tathāvyavasthiteṣu dīrghādi prajñapyate
YXpsk:191: atha vijñaptir nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
YXpsk:193: atra ca tadālambanād eva yaj jāyate cittāt saṃsthānam tad evavijñaptiḥ na punar anyālambanāt
YXpsk:194: evaṃ ca punarbruvata oṣṭhādisaṃsthānam atadālambanacittajatvān nirākṛtam pūrvapraṇidhānajaṃca
YXpsk:195: tad dhi praṇidhānacittādanyavipākahetucittajam apīti na vijñaptir iṣyate
YXpsk:196: tatra yadi vijñaptyākhyaṃsaṃsthānam ekaṃ kāyākhyasamudāyavyāpi tad ekatvād vyāpitvāc ca pratyavayavaṃ gṛhyatesarvasmiṃstadbhāvāt
YXpsk:197: na vā tad ekam bhāgato vyavasthānāt
YXpsk:201: yadi kāyād arthāntaram na saṃsthānam kā tarhi sā
YXpsk:204: sāca kāyasya deśāntarotpattiḥ svanimittaṃ cetanāṃ vijñāpayatīti vijñaptiḥ
YXpsk:207: atra tu rūpavyavasthānaṃ svabhāvataḥsanniveśataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataś ca
YXpsk:211: dravyasadviṣayatvāc cakṣurādīnām saṃsthānasya vijñapteś caprajñaptisattvāt na cakṣuṣo viṣayatvam asti
YXpsk:213: atra hi lokānuvṛttyā varṇaḥsaṃsthānaviśeṣaṇaś cakṣurviṣayatvena vivakṣitaḥ
YXpsk:214: tathā hisaṃsthānaviśiṣṭaś cakṣuṣā varṇo gṛhyate na kevalaṃsaṃsthānaṃ varṇo vādīrghādisaṃsthānaviśiṣṭavarṇanirbhāsacakṣurvijñānotpatteḥ
YXpsk:215: ato varṇaḥ saṃsthānaṃ cacakṣuṣo viṣaya iti loke prasiddhiḥ
YXpsk:216: tathā deśāntarotpattiviśiṣṭakāyasantatigrahaṇād vijñaptir api cakṣuṣo viṣaya iti prasiddhiḥ
YXpsk:217: paramārthatas tu saṃsthānavanna varṇo 'pi cakṣuṣo viṣayaḥ saṃsthānavat paramāṇoraniṣpannatvād vijñānasya bāhyārthāviṣayatvāt
YXpsk:219: rūpānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tannirdeśānantaram eva śabdasyanirdeśo nyāyya iti praśnaḥ śabdaḥ katamaḥ
YXpsk:221: evaṃ hy upādāyarūpatvāviśeṣe 'pianyendriyaviṣayebhyo rūpādibhyo 'sya viśeṣa ukto bhavati
YXpsk:222: śrotraviṣayaś ca śabda eveti parasparabhinnānāṃśabdabhedānāṃ śabdāyatanatvenābheda ukto bhavati
YXpsk:237: jihvāyā eva viṣayaḥjihvāviṣayaś ca rasa eveti pūrvad vistareṇa vaktavyam
YXpsk:239: anyas tu bhedastatsaṃyogabhedāt anantaś ca bhavati
YXpsk:240: atra hy upādāyarūpanirdeśaḥ prastutaḥ rasānantaraṃtuspraṣṭavyaikadeśa upādāyarūpatvenoddiṣṭa ity atorasanirdeśānantaraṃ spraṣṭavyaikadeśanirdidikṣayā praśnaḥ spraṣṭavyaikadeśaḥ katamaiti
YXpsk:246: kāyasya viṣaya iti kāyasyaiva viṣayo na cakṣurādīnām itirūpaśabdādibhyo 'sya bheda ukto bhavati
YXpsk:247: kāyasya ca viṣayaḥsparśa eveti bhūtabhautikayoḥ parasparavilakṣaṇatve 'pi sparśatvenābheda ukto bhavati
YXpsk:248: kāyasya viṣaya iti bhūtānām api kāyaviṣayatvād upādāyarūpaprasaṅga ity ata āha mahābhūtāni sthāpayitveti
YXpsk:250: nanu ca kāyendriyeṇa spṛśyata iti ślakṣṇatvādi spraṣṭavyam ucyate
YXpsk:251: yac ca yena spṛśyate niyogāttad api tat spṛśatīti kāyendriye 'pi sparśatvaprasaṅgaḥ
YXpsk:255: tasmādviṣayendriyayor nirantarotpattau yadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayamupalabhate tena sa viṣayaḥ spṛṣṭa ity upacaryate na tuviṣayeṇa vijñānāśrayaḥ
YXpsk:256: ata eva kāyendriyeṇa bhūtāny evaspṛśyanta ity upacaryate na tadāśritā rūpādayaḥkāyavijñānenāgrahaṇāt
YXpsk:257: puṣpādiṣu ca varṇādyupaghātastadāśrayopaghātāt na kāyasaṃsparśād iti
YXpsk:274: nanu ca grīṣme śaradi ca saty api śītauṣṇābhilāṣo na bhavati
YXpsk:276: evaṃ ca tatkāryam apitajjātīyatvāl lakṣyate lākṣaṇikaiḥ
YXpsk:280: ataḥ kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃkṛtveha nirdeśo jighatsā pipāseti
YXpsk:281: vāyudhātubhūyiṣṭho hi kaścit spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo jighatsāhetuḥ koṣṭha utpadyate
YXpsk:298: evamanyasminn apy upādāyarūpe yathāsambhavam āśrayaviśeṣātparasparaviśeṣo 'vagantavya iti
YXpsk:300: rūpaskandhād upādāyarūpād vāvijñaptir evāvaśiṣyata itipraśnaḥ avijñaptiḥ katameti
YXpsk:313: asaṃvaraḥsarv ākār apar opag hāta prav ṛtti ḥ
YXpsk:317: e ftatra caturṣu dhyāneṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare ca sāsravasamādhijo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ
YXpsk:319: tasyāstūpādāyarūpatvaṃ bhūtāny āśritya pravṛtter anuvṛtteś ca
YXpsk:326: anidarśanaṃ sapratigham cakṣurādayaḥ pañca śabdagandharasasparśāś catvāraḥanidarśanam apratighaṃ ca dharmāyatanikaṃ rūpam
YXpsk:328: iha tvekādaśadravya eva rūpaskandho vivakṣita iti sāmādānikam evarūpam anidarśanam apratigham ity uktaṃ nānyat
YXpsk:331: na ca varṇanibhā anyā nīlādikād varṇāt
YXpsk:333: te ca varṇātmakatvādihopāttā eveti punar na nirdiṣṭāḥ
YXpsk:335: vaibhūtvikaṃvimokṣadhyāyigocaraṃ yad rūpamtad vikalpātmakatvād iha nopāttam
YXpsk:337: pratibimbaṃ ca viṣayapratyavabhāso vijñānasyaivetina vijñānāt pratibimbaṃ pratibimbād vā vijñānaṃ pṛthag asti
YXpsk:339: ko vāprabhāvamahatām asmadvidho buddhivispanditāny avagāhituṃ samarthaḥ
YXpsk:341: etad uktaṃ bhavati vijñaptisamādhisambhūtaṃkuśalākuśalam upādāyarūpam vikṣiptāvikṣiptacittasyācittasyaca yad anubadhnātitat parityāgakāraṇābhāve uktaṃ bhavati avijñaptir iti
YXpsk:342: rūpakriyāsvabhāvāpi satīsvasamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃvijñaptivat paraṃ na vijñapayatītyavijñaptiḥ
YXpsk:343: atra ca vaibhāṣikaparikalpitavijñaptivad avijñaptirapi naivāsti pramāṇāviṣayatvāt
YXpsk:345: tathā hiyayā cetanayākṛtābhyupagama upasampadādividhānapūrvakaṃ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇotitayā cetanayālayavijñāne'nāgatatajjātīyacetanotpattaye bījam āhitam yata uttarakālamahaṃ prāṇātipātādibhyaḥ prativirata iti samādānasmṛtirutpadyate
YXpsk:346: rtasyāṃ samutpannāyāṃ yo lajjī na sa śikṣāṃbhinatti
YXpsk:347: evaṃ ca sānubandhā samādānacetanā saṃvara ityuktam bhavati
YXpsk:348: tathā dhyānaṃ mārgaṃ vā samāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpaṃ mārgam āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasyapratilambhād vyutthito 'pi na punar mithyāvāgādiṣu pravartatesaṃyagvāgādiṣv eva pravartate
YXpsk:349: ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃkṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni dhyānasaṃvaraś ca vyavasthāpyate
YXpsk:352: evaṃ cakriyācetanābhyupagamacetanā ca sattveṣudrohāśayānugatāsaṃvara ity uktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:353: atra cavijñaptisamādhijatvaṃ subodham eveti na punar ihaprapañcitam
YXpsk:354: kuśalākuśalatvaṃ tu saṃvarāsaṃvaracetanānāṃsvata eva tadanubandhasya kuśalākuśalacetanākṣiptatvāt kuśalākuśalacetanāphalatvāc ca
YXpsk:358: kasmāt punar ayam avijñaptiparyanto rūpaskandho rūpam ityucyate
YXpsk:359: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā t urūpyate rūpyata iti bhikṣavastasmād rūpopādānaskandhaity ucyate
YXpsk:362: sūtre hi vpāṇyādisaṃsparśena rūpaṇād rūpamity uktam
YXpsk:365: iyaṃ ca santānam adhikṛtyocyate nakṣaṇamkṣaṇasyotpādavināśakālayor adhikṛtatvāt
YXpsk:366: rūpaskandhānantaraṃ vedanāskandhanirdeśāvasarastadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād iti praśnaḥ vedanā katameti
YXpsk:370: sa ca svabhāvabhedāt trividhaḥsukho duḥkho 'duḥkhāsukhaś ca
YXpsk:375: punaścoktam sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇādaduḥkhāsukhasya ceti
YXpsk:379: tathā coktam sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃpratītyotpadyate sukhā vedanetivistaraḥ
YXpsk:381: yadi ca viṣayānubhavo vedanā syātekālambanebhyo'sya ko viśeṣaḥsyāt
YXpsk:383: evaṃ tarhisañjñādhimokṣasmṛtiprajñādīnām ālambanadvārako vedanāvatsvabhāvo na vaktavyaḥ
YXpsk:384: athaikālambanebhyonimittodgrahaṇādibhiḥ sañjñādīnāṃ viśeṣa ucyate vedanāyā viṣayānubhavena kiṃ neṣyate
YXpsk:385: sparśānubhavaś catatsamprayogaḥ kāraṇabhāvo vā parikalpyeta tadālambanatvāsambhavāt
YXpsk:388: na ca loke śāstre vānubhavaśabdaḥ kārye kāraṇe vā prasiddhaḥ
YXpsk:390: evaṃtu manyante śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃphalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ
YXpsk:398: yat tarhy uktaṃ pratītyasamutpāde yasyāmutpannāyām aviyogecchā jāyatesā sukhā vedaneti tat katham
YXpsk:400: yasyām utpannāyāmaviyogecchā jāyata ity arthata uktaṃ bhavati tasyāṃniruddhāyāṃ punaḥ saṃyogecchāpi bhavatīti
YXpsk:402: yat tarhyanicchopagatarāgaparyavasthānānāṃ yatīnāṃ rāgaje sukha utpanne viyogecchā jāyate nirodhe cāsaṃyogacchandaḥ tatkatham
YXpsk:404: śīlasamādhiparipanthitvaṃ tasya sukhasya paśyatāṃ tadubhayaṃbhavatīti nāsti virodhaḥ
YXpsk:411: tatra kāyacittopacayapravṛttatvān manojñasvabhāvatvāc ca sukho 'nubhava iti nirodhe punas tatsaṃyogābhilāṣaḥ pravartate
YXpsk:412: kāyacittāpacayapravṛttatvāsvabhāvataś ca pratikūlo duḥkho'nubhava iti tasyotpādetadviyogacchando bhavati
YXpsk:413: yas tu nobhayapravṛtto 'sti ca so'nubhavo 'duḥkhāsukhaḥ akṛṣṇāśuklakarmavat
YXpsk:415: eṣa tu trividho 'nubhavaḥ pratyekam āśrayabhedāt punaḥṣaḍvidho bhavaticakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanakāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajatvāt
YXpsk:419: punaḥ vipakṣapratipakṣabhedena pratyekam anubhavasyadvidhā vyavasthānam sāmiṣo nirāmiṣa iti gredhāśritonaiṣkramyāśritaśceti
YXpsk:422: tasmiṃs tṛṣṇāpriyaikaputropagūḍhanyāyenāviyogam ivecchantī yā pravartatesā āmiṣam
YXpsk:426: apekṣābhiṣvaṅgaprārthanālakṣaṇena kāmenaguṇyante punaḥ punar abhyasyanta iti kāmaguṇāḥ
YXpsk:433: kimarthaṃ punar atrasvarūpata eva bheda ukto nāśrayādibhedena yathānyatra
YXpsk:434: iha saṅkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt sarvabhedānāṃ ca svarūpād apṛthaktvād āśrayādibhedena nokta iti
YXpsk:435: vedanāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ sañjñāskandhanirdeśāvasaraity ataḥ praśnaḥ sañjñā katameti
YXpsk:440: evaṃ tarhicakṣurādivijñānasamprayuktā sañjñāviṣayanimittodgrahaṇātmikā na syāt viśeṣāsaṃlakṣaṇāt
YXpsk:442: anyathāpūrvam agṛhīte viśeṣe paścād api nirūpaṇaṃ na syāt nīlametat pītam etad iti
YXpsk:443: svarūpābhede 'pi bhedaḥ sañjñāyā āśrayataālambanataś ca veditavyaḥ
YXpsk:445: ālambanaṃ punaḥsanimittam animittam parīttammahadgatam apramāṇam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃca
YXpsk:446: tatraśabdadvāreṇa yad artharūpam adhyāropitam tena nimittenavastusvarūpaṃ sanimittam
YXpsk:447: tasmin vastuny adhyāropitaṃrūpam etac chabdo 'sāv iti yā sañjñā sā sanimittālambanā
YXpsk:448: animittaṃ punar anadhyāropitākāraṃ vastusvarūpam nirvāṇam bhavāgraṃ ca
YXpsk:450: avyutpannaśabdārthasambandhasya hi rūpasvarūpa eva sañjñā bhavati na tu rūpam iti
YXpsk:452: nirvāṇadhātur apisarvasaṃskṛtanimittapratyastamitasvarūpa iti tadālambanenāpisamādhinā samprayuktā sañjñā animittālambanā
YXpsk:455: bhavāgrasyātrāsphuṭanimittatvāt tadālambanam animittamucyate 'nudarākanyānyāyena na punas tatra nimittaṃnaivāstīty animittam
YXpsk:462: sañjñāskandhanirdeśānantaraṃ saṃskāraskandhanirdeśonyāyyas tadanantaram uddiṣṭatvād ity ataḥ praśnaḥ saṃskārāḥ katame iti
YXpsk:466: sametya sambhūya pratyayaiḥ kṛtatvāt sarva evarūpādiskandhasaṅgṛhītā dharmāḥ saṃskārā ity ucyante
YXpsk:469: ata evavedanāsañjñayoḥ sparśamanaskārādibhiś caitasikatvāviśeṣe 'pyāha vedanāsañjñābhyām anye caitasikā iti
YXpsk:470: vedanāsañjñayoścaitasikatve saty api vedanāsañjñāskandhasaṅgṛhītatvān nasaṃskāraskandhe 'sti saṅgraha iti pradarśanārtham
YXpsk:472: tathā hi vedanayā śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃphalavipākam anubhavati
YXpsk:474: sañjñayāhidṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv artheṣu nimittam udgṛhya dṛṣṭādiṣudṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātā iti lokaḥ saṃvyavahāre pravartata ity atovedanāsañjñe pṛthakskandhīkṛte nānye caitasikā iti
YXpsk:475: yadivedanāsañjñābhyām anye sparśādayo vicārāntāś caitasikādharmāś cittaviprayuktāś ca prāptyādayaḥsaṃskāraskandhasaṅgṛhītāḥ evaṃ sati sūtravirodhaḥ
YXpsk:479: cetanā hicittābhisaṃskaraṇe pradhānaṃanuvartante manaskārādaya iticetanaiva saṃskāraskandhatvenoktā
YXpsk:480: tathā hi kuśale cittaṃprerayaty akuśale 'py avyākṛte 'pi sukhaduḥkhādyavasthāsv api cittaṃ prerayatīti
YXpsk:481: saṃskāravac caitasikā api dharmā navijñāyanta iti praśnaḥ
YXpsk:484: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ataḥpṛcchati
YXpsk:487: 'pi sparśādayo vicārāntāḥ pañcabhir āśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatāprakāraiś cittānuvartanātsamam prayuktā iti samprayuktāḥ
YXpsk:488: cittena samprayuktā ity aviśeṣābhidhānāt sarveṣāṃ sarvacittasamprayogaḥ prasakta ititannirdhāraṇārtham āha eṣāṃpañca sarvatragāḥ
YXpsk:496: ete hipañcadharmāḥ sarvaṃ cittam anugacchantīti sarvatragaḥ
YXpsk:499: avaśyaṃ hi sarvacittapravṛttiṣutrikasannipātena bhavitavyam trikasannipātaś casparśāvyabhicārīty ataḥ sparśasya sarvatragatvam
YXpsk:501: niranubhavasya nimittodgrahaṇanirapekṣasya cacittasyābhāvād vedanāsañjñayor api sarvatragatvam
YXpsk:502: cetanā tumanaskarmaiveti tayāpy avaśyaṃ sarvatra cetasi bhavitavyamity ata ete pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragāḥ
YXpsk:503: pañca pratiniyataviṣayā iti pratiniyato viṣaya eṣāṃ na sarva itipratiniyataviṣayāḥ
YXpsk:508: etair eva ca samprayuktaṃ cittaṃ kuśalam
YXpsk:509: ṣaṭ kleśāḥ rāgaḥ pratighomāno 'vidyā dṛṣṭir vicikitsā ca
YXpsk:513: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāro 'nyatheti vacanād upakleśā avaśiṣṭā ityaviśeṣābhidhāne 'py asamprajanyāvasānāḥ eveti gamyate
YXpsk:514: kleśāṅgikatvāc cittakleśakaratvāc ca kleśasamīpe vartanta ityupakleśāḥ
YXpsk:515: kaukṛtyādyāś catvāra iti kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ vitarko vicāraś ca
YXpsk:516: anyathāpīti na kevalam ete upakleśā evakiṃ tarhi kuśalā apy avyākṛtā apīti
YXpsk:517: sa eṣa caitasikānāṃ piṇḍaḥsamāsata ekapañcāśad bhavati
YXpsk:518: eṣāṃ tu pratyekaṃ svarūpaṃ na prajñāyata iti praśnaḥ sparśaḥ katamaḥ
YXpsk:521: caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇata eva nirdeśo na karmato yathānyatrasaṅkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt
YXpsk:527: tasmin satitatkālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikāraḥtena sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sasparśaḥ
YXpsk:528: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇasukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraindriyavikāraḥ
YXpsk:531: evaṃ hy uktaṃsūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhāvedaneti
YXpsk:538: etac ca karma cittasantaterālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktam na tuyaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ
YXpsk:539: yad apy atra nidarśanam ucyate samādhilābhī manaskāralābhīty ucyataiti tatraviśiṣṭamanaskāralābhād eva manaskāralābhīty ucyate
YXpsk:540: anyathā hi sarvasattvā eva manaskāralābhinaḥ syuḥ sarveṣāṃpraticittakṣaṇaṃ manaskārabhāvāt
YXpsk:545: atha vā guṇata ity upakariṣu doṣata ity apakāriṣu anubhayata iti madhyastheṣu
YXpsk:547: yasyāṃsatyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspando bhavatiayaskāntavaśād ayaspraspandavat
YXpsk:548: āha ca kṣaṇāntarānavasthānaṃ nirvyāpāraṃ yayā manaḥ
YXpsk:552: tebhyovyavacchedārthaṃ manaskarmety āha vijñānasya parispandaiva yo dharmaḥ sa eva cetanā nānya iti jñāpanārtham
YXpsk:570: yuktitaāptopadeśād vā yad vastu niḥsandigdhaṃ tan niścitam
YXpsk:571: yenaivākāreṇa tan niścitam anityaduḥkhādyākāreṇa tenaivākāreṇa tadvastunaś cetasi niveśanamevam evaitannānyathety avadhāraṇam adhimokṣaḥ
YXpsk:573: adhimuktipradhāno hi svasiddhāntātparapravādibhir apahartuṃ na śakyate
YXpsk:580: tat pūrvagṛhītasyavastunaḥ punaḥ punar ālambanākārasmaraṇam abhilapanatā
YXpsk:582: sāpunarālambanābhilapane sati na cittasyālambanāntareākārāntare vā vikṣepo bhavatīty ato'vikṣepakarmikā
YXpsk:604: evaṃ ca samādhivat prajñāpi pratiniyataviṣayetyuktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:606: saṃyag mithyā vāsaṅkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ
YXpsk:607: yuktir yogaḥ āptopadeśaḥ anumānam pratyakṣaṃ ca
YXpsk:608: tena triprakāreṇa yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ
YXpsk:623: iti karma trividham puṇyam apuṇyam āniñjyaṃ ca
YXpsk:630: astikuśalam akuśalaṃ ca karma tac ca yathākramamiṣṭāniṣṭaphalam tad api kuśalākuśalakarmahetukamneśvarādinirmitam iti ya evaṃ karmaphalasvarūpe 'viparīte cakarmaphalavipākayor hetuphalasambandhe 'bhisampratyayaḥiyaṃ karmaphalayor astitvasampratyayākārā śraddhā
YXpsk:633: duḥkhahetutvātpratyayādyākāraiś cāviparītatvād dhetubhūtās ta eva pañcopādānaskandhāḥ samudayasatyam
YXpsk:636: tatra duḥkhasamudayasatyayor asti duḥkham asti samudaya ity abhisampratyayākāraiva śraddhā
YXpsk:637: nirodhamārgasatyayor abhilāṣākārā śraddhāśakyo mayāprāptuṃ nirodho mārgaś cotpādayitumiti
YXpsk:639: durlabhatvānmahārghatvāt prītikaratvād upakārakaratvād amānuṣādyupaghātapratipakṣatvāc ca ratnānīva ratnāni
YXpsk:640: tatradurlabhatvaṃ bhavabhogeṣv asaktaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣairbodhisattvair nairantaryeṇa bodhisambhāreṣu pravartamānaistribhiḥ kalpāsaṅkhyeyair buddhatvaṃ prāpyata iti durlabham
YXpsk:646: puṇy ajñā nasa mbhā rāṅg abhā vaga manā dvīryapāramitobhayasambhāraḥ
YXpsk:653: amānuṣādyupaghātapraśamanaṃ punar yathoktaṃ sūtre saced bho bhikṣavo 'raṇyagatānāṃ veti vistareṇa yāvad yat tadbhaviṣyati bhayaṃ vā chambhitatvaṃ vā romaharṣo vā tatpratigamiṣyatīti
YXpsk:664: aṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ saṅghaḥ catvāraḥ pratipannāś catvāraśca phalasthāḥ
YXpsk:667: sarvasahetukaduḥkhopaśamātmakatvāt prāpakatvāttaddyotakatvāc ca dharme prasādalakṣanaiva śraddhā
YXpsk:670: sati vastuni guṇavaty aguṇavativā sampratyayākārā sati guṇavati ca prasādākārā satiguṇavati ca prāptum utpādayituṃ śakye 'bhilāṣākārā
YXpsk:673: kuśalaviṣayatvān na tṛṣṇā śraddhāpūrvakatvācchandasya na cchandaḥ
YXpsk:674: cetasaḥ prasāda iti śraddhā hicittakāluṣyavairodhikīty atas tatsamprayogekleśopakleśamalakāluṣyavigamāc cittaṃ śraddhām āgamyaprasīdatīti cetasaḥ prasāda ucyate
YXpsk:675: udakaprasādakamaṇisthānīyaṃ dharmāntaraṃ caitasikaṃśraddhā na rūpaprasādātmiketi pradarśanārtham āha cetasaḥprasāda iti
YXpsk:682: yasya kriyāsu pravṛttir nivṛttir vā sa tasyādhipatiḥ svāmītyarthaḥ
YXpsk:683: ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ vādhipatiṃ svāminaṃ kṛtvāsadbhir vigarhitatvād aniṣṭavipākatvāc ca pāpam evāvadyam tenāvadyena kṛtenākṛtena vā cittasyāvalīnatā
YXpsk:684: kulajñānādibhir guṇaiḥ pāpakriyāyām ātmānam ayogyaṃ matvā kathaṃ hi sā mama yaivaṃvidhenaivaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃkriyate kariṣyate vā dharme 'py etad aniṣṭavipākatvātparopaghātapravṛttatvāc ca garhitam ity evaṃ yātmānaṃ dharmaṃ cāvekṣamāṇasyāvadyena lajjāsā hrīḥ
YXpsk:690: caivaṅkarmāṇaṃ viditvā vigarhiṣyantīty aślokādibhayād avadyena lajjate
YXpsk:694: alobhaity ayam akāras triṣv artheṣu vartate
YXpsk:697: atra pratipakṣa eva vartate nānyasminnābhāva iti pradarśanārtham āha lobhapratipakṣa iti
YXpsk:700: lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu caāsaktiḥ prārthanā ca
YXpsk:704: athavānāgrahaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ nirvidgrahaṇaṃ bhavebhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyākāro yo 'nāgraho 'yam alobhaiti
YXpsk:708: dveṣo hi sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghātaḥ
YXpsk:711: maitrātmako dveṣasya yaḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'dveṣaḥ nānya iti
YXpsk:716: sarva eva hi kuśalā dharmāḥkliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāravirodhāt pratipakṣa ity ata āha bhūtasampratipattir iti
YXpsk:722: tatra dvayoḥ prajñādravyayoḥ samavadhānāsambhavād vīryeṇa samādhinā vā samprayuktā prajñā pratisaṅkhyety ucyateyadbalenānuddhṛtānupahatakleśabījo 'pi kleśānām avakāśan nadadati
YXpsk:734: tatpratipakṣaś ca vīryam ityataḥ kausīdyavad ubhayaprasaṅge vyavacchedārtham āha kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāho vīryamna tu kliṣṭa iti
YXpsk:736: nanu ca kliṣṭaṃ svabhyastatvātsvarasenaiva pravartatekiṃ tatrotsāhena
YXpsk:739: tat punar yatsamprayogātsannāhe prayoge vāalīnatve vāvyāvṛttau vāsantuṣṭau vākuśaleṣu dharmeṣu cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ tad vīryam
YXpsk:749: tatra kāyakarmaṇyatākāyasya svakāryeṣu laghusamutthānatā yato bhavati
YXpsk:750: cittakarmaṇyatā samyaṅmanasikāraprayuktasya hlādalāghavanimittaṃ yac caitasikaṃ dharmāntaram
YXpsk:751: tadyogāccittam asaktam ālambane pravartata ity atas taccittakarmaṇyatety ucyate
YXpsk:752: kāyasya punaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣa evaprītyāhṛtaḥ kāyaprasrabdhir veditavyā
YXpsk:754: atra caitasikādhikārād acaitasiky api kāyaprasrabdhiḥprasrabdhisambodhyaṅgatvenoktākāyakarmaṇyatā vācittakarmaṇyatām āvāhayatīty ato'caitasiky api kāyakarmaṇyatātroktā
YXpsk:761: kleśebhyaś cittaṃ na rakṣati kuśalaṃ ca hāpayati
YXpsk:762: apramādenapunaḥ kleśān prajahātipratipakṣāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayatītyato 'pramādaḥ pramādapratipakṣa uktaḥ
YXpsk:763: alobho yāvad vīryamity alobhādveṣāmohāḥ saha vīryeṇa gṛhyante
YXpsk:764: yān alobhādīnvīryaparyantān niśrityāgamya prāpyākuśalān dharmānprajahātīty anena sarve alobhādayo 'pramāda ity uktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:765: akuśalā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāś ca viṣayā veditavyāḥ
YXpsk:771: yasmād vīryasahītān alobhādīn niśrityākuśalān dharmān prajahāti tatpratipakṣāṃśca dharmān bhāvayati tasmāt savīryeṣv alobhādiṣv apramādaḥprajñapyata ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā sakāraṇā cāpramādasyaprajñaptir uktā
YXpsk:784: nirvāsiteṣu kliṣṭeṣu dharmeṣv iti yayety upekṣaivasambadhyate
YXpsk:787: upekṣā hi saṅkliṣṭavihāravairodhikītyavaśyaṃ tayā rāgādipravṛttivibandhevartitavyam ity atas tayānirvāsiteṣv ity uktam
YXpsk:799: iyaṃ cāpramādavat prajñaptita eva na dravyasatīadveṣāṃśaeva prajñapanāt
YXpsk:809: upādīyate 'nayā tṛṣṇayā tribhavotpattiḥ paunarbhavikaṃ vākarmeti tṛṣṇāyāupādānākhyā

YXpsk:814: athavā spraṣṭavyaviśeṣo 'pi sneha itivyavacchedārtham āha adhyavasānam iti

YXpsk:845: śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyānkulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatiḥayaṃ

YXpsk:859: tatpratipakṣabhūtaṃ yad dhyānasamāpattyādikaṃ tanmanuṣyadharmebhya uttariviśeṣa ucyate
YXpsk:860: tasminviśeṣādhigama'prāptesatiprāpto mayā uttariviśeṣādhigama itiyā cittasyonnatiḥ so 'bhimānaḥ
YXpsk:864: yuktaṃ tāvat samena samaḥ samānād vā viśiṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭād vā viśiṣṭa ity unnatisthānatvān mānaḥātmānaṃ tu nyūnaṃ paśyataḥ kim unnatisthānaṃ yatas tasyamāna ucyate
YXpsk:866: apica santikecid ye prakṛṣṭe ca sattvarāśau hīnam apy ātmānaṃ bahu manyante
YXpsk:875: aguṇavata ityanena hidānaśīlādyabhāve guṇavattvam abhyupagataṃ bhavatīty atonirvastukatvān mithyāmāna ucyate
YXpsk:883: karmaṇy ajñānaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve yad ajñānamapratipattir anavabodhaḥ iyaṃ sahajā avidyā

YXpsk:888: tāsāṃkliṣṭatvāviśeṣe 'py ālambanākārabhedādbhedapradarśanārthaṃ punar apy āha satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭir iti vistaraḥ
YXpsk:893: ātmā hi nityaś caikaś cātmavādibhir abhyupagamyate
YXpsk:895: pañcopādānaskandhānityādi ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmānam ātmīyaṃveti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti ta imān eva pañcopādānaskandhāniti sūtra uktam
YXpsk:896: te hi svarūpataḥ kāryato vā ātmānaṃ prajñapayeyuḥ

YXpsk:900: na ca buddhivṛttito 'nyac caitanyaṃ svasthacittenaśakyate vaktuṃ pratipattum vā
YXpsk:902: ekeṣāṃca nirgranthānāṃ jñānasvarūpa ātmeti teṣām ātmātmīyagrāho'nantaroktaeva draṣṭavyaḥ
YXpsk:904: yaḥ paśyati yāvan manyate tathā yo vedayateānāti smarati cetayate vijānāti ca sa ātmeti
YXpsk:910: yatra tarhicakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati naivadurmanāiti tatra katham
YXpsk:911: tatrāpi yatrātmaprajñaptiḥ samūhesantāne vā sa eva cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvety ucyate
YXpsk:912: rūpanirbhāsataiva hi rūpadarśanam yasmāt tadbhāvābhāverūpasya darśanādarśane vyavasthāpyete
YXpsk:914: yatra tūktaṃ vedayata iti vedanā evaṃ yāvad vijānātīti vijñānam
YXpsk:917: atha vā viṣayanirbhāsatām upādāya kartṛvyapadeśaḥ yathoktaṃ prāk
YXpsk:918: na cātmalābhavyatiriktākriyā vidyate kṣaṇikatvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ kriyākāle'navasthānāt
YXpsk:920: ātmalābhānantaraṃ cabhāvānāṃ nirhetukatvād yadi vināśo na syāt paścād api nasyāt vinaṣṭur vināśasya ca paścād ātmātiśayābhāvāt
YXpsk:921: sahetukavināśaparikalpe ca vinaṣṭaiva tadvyatirikto vāvināśahetuḥ parikalpyeta
YXpsk:922: pūrvasmin pakṣaātmalābhānantaraṃbhāvānāṃ vināśaḥ naiva vāsti vināśa iti prasajyate
YXpsk:923: yo 'nyanirapekṣaḥ pūrvaṃ yasya na kāraṇam sa paścād api tasyanaiva kāraṇam ātmātiśayābhāvāt
YXpsk:924: itarasminn api pakṣe vināśānāṃ kāraṇaniyamo na syāt
YXpsk:926: naitad evam kāryāṇāṃ hiparasparato bhinnasvarūpatvāt tatkāraṇānām api śaktibhedātniyamo na virudhyate
YXpsk:928: tasmāt sarvaṃ vāvināśakāraṇaṃ sarvavināśasya naiva vā vināśakāraṇam astītipratipattavyam
YXpsk:929: vināśaś ca yadi vināśakāraṇāt pūrvam apy astievaṃ sati vināśakāraṇavaiyarthyaṃ prasajyeta
YXpsk:930: bhāvānāṃ cavināśe saty utpattir iti vinaṣṭānām apy utpattiprasaṅgaḥ
YXpsk:931: athavināśakāraṇebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ na vidyate evaṃ sati bhāvavadabhāvasyāpiprāgabhāvaḥ prajyate
YXpsk:932: yasya ca prāgabhāvaḥtasyacāvaśyaṃ bhāvatvāt pradhvaṃsābhāvenāpi bhavitavyam
YXpsk:933: evaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣāt sarvaṃ bhāvātmakamabhāvātmakam vā prasajyeta
YXpsk:934: yadi ca pradhvaṃsābhāvasyāpipradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ evaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvānām anavasthānāttatkāraṇānām api neṣyateevaṃ satibhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvasyāpi naiveṣṭavyā dvayor apyātmātiśayatvābhāvāt
YXpsk:936: yady ananyā ātmaivātmanaḥ kartā karma ceti nayujyate
YXpsk:937: yadi ca labdhātmakaḥ kriyāṃ karoti nāsautasyātmabhūtā
YXpsk:938: yo hi yena vināpi bhavati na sa tasyātmabhūtoyujyate
YXpsk:940: kriyārahitāc cakriyādhyāsito 'nya eveti kathaṃ kartuḥ karmaṇo vātmabhūtākriyā
YXpsk:942: athālabdhātmakaḥ evam api tasya kartṛtvaṃ kriyāyāś catadātmabhūtatvaṃ na yujyate dvayor apy asattvāt
YXpsk:943: kiṃcaikasya kriyārahitatvāt dvitīyasya kriyādhyāsitatvātkartṛtvābhāvaḥ kartur abhāvāc ca kriyāyā apy abhāva itievaṃ ca svarasavināśāt kṣaṇikatvam evābhyupagataṃ bhavati
YXpsk:947: na ca niḥkriyaṃ karma kartā vāyujyata ity avaśyaṃ tatrānyayā kriyayā bhavitavyam
YXpsk:950: evaṃ tarhi dravyam eva kriyāntararahitaṃ janyatvena kiṃ neṣyate
YXpsk:952: yadi ca kriyā kārakair janyate nadravyam
YXpsk:953: evaṃ prākpradhvaṃsābhāvau kriyāyā eva na dravyasyetisarvadravyāṇi nityāni naiva vā santīty abhyupeyam
YXpsk:954: yadi cakārakebhyo 'nyā kriyā kriyārahitaṃ casādhanam evaṃkriyāṇām anavasthānaṃ sādhanābhāvo vā
YXpsk:957: yadi ca gantur anyāgatiḥ taṇḍulebhyo 'nyā paciḥ evaṃ sati gantur nadeśāntaraprāptiḥ taṇḍulānām vāpacanaṃpūrvāvasthāto'vikṛtatvāt
YXpsk:958: atha kriyaiva svāśrayasya vikārahetur itipūrvāvasthāto vikṛtatvam apratiṣiddham
YXpsk:963: tasmādātmalābhānantaravināśeṣu nirīheṣv antarvyāpārapuruṣarahiteṣupañcasūpādānaskandheṣv eva sadbhāvamātreṇaprāgabhūtānām anyeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ hetubhāvenavyavasthiteṣu nityakartṛbhoktṛgrāhapūrvako 'yamātmātmīyagrāhaḥ nātmany ātmīye ceti
YXpsk:967: na hy amūḍhasyānātmany ātmeti jñānaṃ bhavati

YXpsk:990: draṣṭur ātmabhāvasaṃśabditāḥ yān āśritya dṛṣṭayaḥpravartantete tadāśrayāagrataḥ śreṣṭhatoviśiṣṭataḥ paramataity ete 'grādayaḥ śabdās tulyārthā

YXpsk:1064: kāyavākkuhanopāttāḥ śayyāsanādaya upajīvyante na cavyāyāmalabdhā iti mithyājīva ucyate
YXpsk:1069: tat punar anyenānyat pratisarati kṣipatyaparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate

YXpsk:1076: saṃyagavavāde yolābho yoniśo manaskāraḥ tasyāntarāyaṃ karotīti
YXpsk:1082: yena harṣaviśeṣeṇa cittamasvatantrīkṛtaṃ tena tad ātmatantrīkaraṇāt paryāttaṃ bhavatītyata uktam cetasaḥ paryādānam iti
YXpsk:1089: etāś canirghṛṇatādayaḥ svayaṃ vadhādiṃ kurvataḥ kārayataḥ paraiśca kriyamāṇān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vānumodataś ca yathākramaṃboddhavyāḥ uttarottaravyākhyānato

YXpsk:1135: prāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃsamādhyālambanād bahir visāryate teṣuyathāsambhavam upakleśātmako vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate
YXpsk:1145: abhipretam anabhipretaṃkuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ kāle'kāle yuktam ayuktaṃ cakṛtvākṛtvā vā mohāṃśikaś cetaso vipratisāraḥ kaukṛtyam
YXpsk:1148: anabhipretaṃ punaḥ parair balād avaṣṭabhyayat kāryate kleśābhibhavād vāyat karoti
YXpsk:1151: taccāpi trividham kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ ca
YXpsk:1157: kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthāvāvṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā sā yato bhavati tan middhaṃ
YXpsk:1158: anyato'py asvatantrā vṛttiś cetaso bhavatīty ata āha cetaso'bhisaṅkṣepa iti
YXpsk:1159: anyato'py abhisaṅkṣepaś cetasa ityasvatantravṛttiś cetasa ity āha

YXpsk:1172: athavācetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaprajñaptiḥ tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt
YXpsk:1185: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā idānīṃ vaktavyā ity ata āha cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥkatama iti
YXpsk:1187: tattvānyatvataś ca na prajñapyante teviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā iti prakaraṇāt sambadhyate

YXpsk:1197: pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogo javo'nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṅkhyā sāmagrī cety evamādayaḥ
YXpsk:1198: idānīṃ sāmagryādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ svarūpanirdhāraṇārthaṃpraśnaḥ prāptiḥ katamety evamādiḥ
YXpsk:1201: prāptānāṃdvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu prāptiḥ samanvāgamaḥ samanugamaḥsamanvāgama iti kṛtvā
YXpsk:1202: evaṃ caprāptiśabdaḥ pratilambhesamanvāgame ca vartataiti jñāpitaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1204: bījaṃ vaśitā sammukhībhāvaś ceti tridhābhidyate yathāyogam iti
YXpsk:1205: tatrāyaṃ yogaḥ prathamātkṣaṇād ārabhya prāptir yāvad vaśitāvasthaṃ bījam ucyata itipratilambhasamanvāgamau bījākhyau bhavataḥ vaśitāsammukhībhāvaś ca samanvāgama eva
YXpsk:1207: kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtair dharmair āhito vijñāne'nāgatatajjātīyadharmahetuḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣo bījam
YXpsk:1208: bīje hilabdhe tadāyattatvād asammukhībhūtamapi yasya tad bījaṃ tatprāptam ucyate
YXpsk:1211: asañjñā vā samāpattir asañjñisamāpattir asañjñānām vāsamāpattirity asañjñisamāpattiḥ
YXpsk:1214: tatra yaḥ śubhakṛtsnebhyo vītarāgaḥ satṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgaḥ
YXpsk:1222: tathā hisañjñām eva vidūṣayan niravaśeṣacittacaittanirodhaṃ prāpnoti
YXpsk:1226: sarvāsv acittikāsv avasthāsv abhāvāt sacittikāsvapy avasthāsu ye na sarvadā bhavanti te'sthāvarāḥ
YXpsk:1227: sthāvaramālayavijñānaṃ sasamprayogam sarvadā bhāvāt kliṣṭaṃ camanaḥ anāsravamārgasatyasamāpattyavasthāṃnirodhasamāpattyavasthāṃ tām aśaikṣāvasthāṃ ca hitvānyāsusarvāsv avasthāsu bhāvād ity asthāvarāṇām iti viśeṣaṇam
YXpsk:1230: evaṃ cāśrayāvasthāviśeṣeasañjñisamāpattiḥ prajñapyata ity uktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1231: samāpatticittenānantaraṃ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayo yaḥ sa samāpatticittena kṛta ity ucyate
YXpsk:1235: bhavāgrād anuccalito 'py astyākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgaḥpṛthagjana ity ata āha bhavāgrāduccalitasyeti
YXpsk:1236: bhavāgrād uccalita ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥ pratipannakaś ca bhavāgrād uccalitaākiñcanyāyatanād avītarāgo 'py asti kaścit phalasthaḥpratipannakaś cety ata āha ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyeti
YXpsk:1238: ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyabhavāgrād uccalitasyety ubhayābhidhānenaāryasyaiveyamanāgāmino 'rhato vā samāpattiḥ na pṛthagjanasyeti jñāpitaṃbhavati
YXpsk:1239: na hi pṛthagjano bhavāgrād uccalatibhavāgrapratipakṣasya mārgasyābhāvāt
YXpsk:1243: asañjñāsamāpattim iva niḥsaraṇasañjñāpūrvakeṇamanasikāreṇa samāpadyante kiṃ tarhi vihārasañjñāpūrvakeṇa
YXpsk:1244: nirodhasamāpattir bhavāgrakī na cāryāṇāṃ bhaveniḥsaraṇasañjñā pravartate
YXpsk:1246: vihāra iti sañjñā vihārasañjñā viharaty anena iti vā vihāraḥ
YXpsk:1248: nirvāṇasadṛśenasamāpattiviśeṣeṇa vihariṣyāma ity anayā sañjñayā saṃskṛtomanasikāro vihārasañjñāpūrvako manasikāra ucyate
YXpsk:1250: sthāvarāṇāmitiṣaṇṇāṃ pravṛttivijñānānāṃ caturṇām ekasyakāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu yathākramaṃ nirodhaṃsamāpadyamānānām
YXpsk:1252: sthāvarā iti vipākavijñānasaṅgṛhītā api santīty ata āha ekatīyānām iti
YXpsk:1253: kliṣṭasya ca manasaḥ sarvasmin sāsrave cāresthānaśīlatvātsthāvaratvam anyatranirodhasamāpattyaśaikṣāvasthayoḥ
YXpsk:1255: samāpattivijñānakṛto vipākavijñāne pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manaso bījopaghātaḥ
YXpsk:1256: nirudhyate 'nena pravṛttivijñānaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca manaḥ kālāntaram apravṛttita itinirodha ucyate
YXpsk:1260: deve ṣūpa pann asyā sthā varāṇāṃcittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo nirodhaḥ
YXpsk:1261: ubṛhatphalā nāma devāś caturthe dhyāne tṛtīyaṃ sthānāntaraṃ
YXpsk:1264: tatra hyupapannasyāsthāvarāś cittacaittāḥsvāśrayesvajātīyacittacaittabījopaghāte vartamānāḥ kṣāmakṣāmatarāutpadyante yāvad ante 'tikṣāmatāṃ gatāś cittāntaraṃsambandhuṃ na śaknuvanti svāśrayasyopahatabījatvāt
YXpsk:1273: samāno bhāga iti sabhāgaḥ sadṛśa ity arthaḥ
YXpsk:1275: teṣu ca nikāyasabhāgeṣu gatibhedenakarmabhedena ca bhinneṣu pratyekam ekajānmiko yaḥ skandhasantānaḥsa nikāyasabhāgākhyaḥ
YXpsk:1277: yaḥ sthitikālaniyama iti abhinnanikāyasabhāgasaṅgṛhītānāṃsaṃskārāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ sthitiniyama ucyate
YXpsk:1278: tasyāḥsthiteḥkālaniyama iyantaṃ kālam anenāsmin nikāyasabhāgesthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ vetyayaṃsthitikālaniyamaḥ
YXpsk:1279: evaṃ ca sthitikālaniyamasvabhāvam āyurity uktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1284: teṣām ātmeti bhāvo yatra sa sattvānāmātmabhāvaḥ
YXpsk:1287: etad uktaṃbhavati gatisthānātmabhāvādibhedena bhinnānāṃ sattvānāṃgatisthānātmabhāvabhedanibandhanaṃ sattvānāṃ yaparaspareṇātmabhāvasādṛśyam tatra nikāyasabhāga itiprajñaptiḥ
YXpsk:1291: saṃskāramātrasyotpādo jātiḥ kiṃ tarhi nikāyasabhāgavartino ye saṃskārāḥ
YXpsk:1292: teṣām evābhūtvā bhāvo jātiḥ na sarveṣām itijñāpanārtham
YXpsk:1293: ye bhāvānām anutpannāvinaṣṭānāmarthāntarabhūtāṃ jātiṃ kāritrataś cādhvavyavasthāṃpratipannāḥ tanmatanirāsārtham āha abhūtvā bhāva iti
YXpsk:1294: svarūpasyaiva hi saṃskārāṇām abhūtvā bhāvo jātiḥ nārthāntarabhūtā na ca kāritrato 'dhvavyavastheti
YXpsk:1298: tatrāntare hetuphalabhāvenāvasthitānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nairantaryeṇotpādaḥ prabandha ucyate
YXpsk:1301: kalalādyavasthāsv api pūrvasmād uttarasya pratikṣaṇamnyathābhāvo vācyaḥ
YXpsk:1302: evaṃ ca prabandhānyathātvejarāprajñaptiḥ naikasya kṣaṇasya nāpy arthāntarabhūteti
YXpsk:1305: ā maraṇāt saṃskārāṇāṃprabandhavṛttau sthitir iti prajñaptiḥ naikasya kṣaṇasya nāpyarthāntarabhūteti jñāpitaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1307: tathaiva teṣām ity ekasmin nikāyasabhāge saṃskārāṇāṃprabandhoparame 'nityatā prajñapyate
YXpsk:1311: tat kimarthaṃ nikāyasabhāga evasaṃskārasantānasya jātyādaya uktāḥ na bāhyasya rūpasyeti
YXpsk:1312: yānīmāni bhagavatā saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānīty uktāni jātir jarāsthitir anityatā ca tāni sattvākhyān eva saṃskārān ādhikṛtya nabāhyān iti jñāpanārtham
YXpsk:1313: kasmāt punar bhagavatā ubhayeṣāmapi tulye jātisattveupāttān eva saṃskārān adhikṛtyasaṃskṛtalakṣaṇāny uktāni
YXpsk:1314: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvartavivartaprabhāvitam ādhyātmikās tu saṃskārājātijarādiprabhāvitāḥ
YXpsk:1315: etad uktaṃ bhavati vināśotpādaubāhyasya rūpasya saṃvartavivartaśabdena loke prasiddhāv itibhagavatāpi lokam anuvartamānena tathaivoktau na jātyādiśabdena
YXpsk:1316: ādhyātmikās tu saṃskārā jātijarādiprabhāvitāḥ jātā jīrṇāḥ sthitā vinaṣṭā iti teṣāṃ bhagavatāpilokānuvṛttyotpādādayo jātyādiśabdena nirdiṣṭā
YXpsk:1324: yenānabhilapyasvarūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ dyotyatetad abhidhānaṃ nāmety ucyate tadyathā cakṣuḥ śrotraṃrūpaṃ śabda iti
YXpsk:1327: evaṃ nāmno laukikācca padāt padaṃ viśeṣitaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1332: anyatrāvartamānaṃ svabhāvaṃviśinaṣṭīti viśeṣaḥ tadyathā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥsarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇam
YXpsk:1333: etad uktaṃ bhavati vastusvabhāvābhidhānamātraṃ nāmaviśiṣṭavastusvabhāvābhidhānaṃ padam iti
YXpsk:1340: ubhayaśabdād api kevalāt katamasyobhayasyeti na vijñāyate
YXpsk:1342: evam anantarasyaivanāmnaḥ padasya cābhivyañjakatvād vyañjanam ity uktaṃbhavati
YXpsk:1349: yadavastheṣv artheṣu vyutpādyante tadavastheṣv eva nāmapadayoḥ prajñaptir iti te tadāśrayatvenocyante
YXpsk:1354: na punarevam akārasya paryāyāntaram asti yenākārābhidhānaṃmuktvākāro gamyeta
YXpsk:1355: etāvac ca sarvaṃ yad uta svabhāvoviśeṣas tadubhayavyavahāraś ca
YXpsk:1356: tat sarvam ebhiranuvyavahriyata ity ata ete nāmapadavyañjanakāyāvyavasthāpitā iti
YXpsk:1357: evam anyeṣām api viprayuktānāṃnāmapadavyañjanakāyavat prayojanāpekṣayā vyavasthānaṃveditavyam
YXpsk:1359: yasya dharmasya yogāt pṛthagjana ity ākhyāyate tatpṛthagjanatvam
YXpsk:1365: tathā hyanutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate
YXpsk:1372: hetuphalanānātvaṃ punar iṣṭasya viṣayasya sucaritam aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃpṛthag anyonyahetutā
YXpsk:1375: tadyathādānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalaṃ
YXpsk:1382: hetuphalayoḥ prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalam utpannaniruddham so 'tītaḥ kāla itiprajñapyate
YXpsk:1386: pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsusarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ
YXpsk:1394: evam ete cittaviprayuktāḥsaṃskārā dharmāṇāmavasthāviśeṣeṣu prajñapyanta iti prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ
YXpsk:1396: saṃskāraskandhānantaraṃvijñānaskandho veditavya ity ata āha vijñānaskandhaḥ
YXpsk:1404: vijñānasvarūpam uktvā tatparyāyapradarśanārtham āha cittaṃ mano 'pitad iti
YXpsk:1411: ata eva tadindriyāśrayeṇāpy utpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyatenendriyam
YXpsk:1412: tathāṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ yad yannirudhyatetat tad anantarasyavijñānasyotpadyamānasyāśrayabhāvena vyavatiṣṭhata ity ataḥsamanantaracittasanniśrayatām upādāya mana ity ucyate
YXpsk:1413: yadetac citratvāc cittam ity uktam taj jātim adhikṛtya nalakṣaṇam
YXpsk:1414: lakṣaṇaṃ tu pratiniyatālambanākāratvān na citramiti na tat prādhānyena cittam
YXpsk:1417: atraiva kāraṇam āha tathāhitac citaṃ sarvasaṃskārabījairiti
YXpsk:1419: lsarvasaṃskārabījaiś citatvāc cittam itiprādhānyena tad evacittam
YXpsk:1424: paunaḥpunyena saṃskārāṇāṃ samudācārād bījapuṣṭir vāsanety ucyate
YXpsk:1428: tathā hi sūtre 'py uktam cakṣuraparibhinnaṃ bhavati rūpāṇy ābhāsagatāni tajjaś camanasikāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati evaṃ tajjasya cakṣurvijñānasya prādurbhāvo bhavatīti
YXpsk:1430: hetupratyayastu sadā sannihitatvād durvijñeyatvāc ca noktaḥ
YXpsk:1431: tadanantaraṃ paryeṣakaṃ manovijñānamparyeṣakād anantaraṃvyavasthāpakam evaṃ vyavasthāpakānantaraṃ vikalpakaṃ manovijñānam utpadyate
YXpsk:1437: tatra ye 'py anye 'kuśalāḥ kuśalasāsravāś ca dharmāsteṣām apy ayam eva nayaḥ
YXpsk:1438: avyākṛtās tu niṣyandavāsanām evapuṣṇanti na vipākavāsanām teṣām avipākatvāt
YXpsk:1441: tathā hi sarvasaṃskārāḥ svabījādhānevartamānā ālayavijñānātmātiśayahetubhāvena vyavatiṣṭhantaitisarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ tat kāryam
YXpsk:1442: sarvasaṃskārāś catadbījopādānād ālayavijñānād utpadyanta itisarvasaṃskārāṇām ālayavijñānaṃ kāraṇam
YXpsk:1443: vipākavāsanāṃ tvadhikṛtya kuśalākuśalānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kāryam eva tatnakāraṇam
YXpsk:1444: kāraṇaṃ tu tad vipākavāsanām upādāyanikāyasabhāgāntareṣu vipākavijñānasyaiveti
YXpsk:1452: etaccālambanaṃ sūkṣmatvāllokapaṇḍitair apiduravadhāram ity ato 'paricchinnālambanākāram ity ucyate napunar anālambanam eva
YXpsk:1457: ālayavijñānaṃsasamprayogaṃ pūrvakarmasaṃskārahetukatvād ekāntenavipāka evety avyākṛtajātīyam eva
YXpsk:1459: atra hyālayavijñānaṃnikāyasabhāgāntareṣu pratisandhim upādāya yāvac cyutiṃtāvat kṣaṇaprabandhapravāhena vartate na tv antarāntarāvicchidyate
YXpsk:1462: tathā kuśalānantaram akuśalam utpadyateakuśalānantaraṃ kuśalam tadubhayānantaram avyākṛtamhīnadhātukānantaraṃ madhyadhātukammadhyadhātukānantaraṃ praṇītadhātukampraṇītadhātukānantaram apraṇītadhātukamapraṇītadhātukānantaraṃ madhyadhātukam iti vistareṇavācyam
YXpsk:1463: nāpy ekaṃ dravyam ā maraṇād anuvartata iti
YXpsk:1468: punaś ca sandhinirmocane 'py uktam ādānavijñāna gambhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījaḥ
YXpsk:1469: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśito mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyuḥ
YXpsk:1474: nirodhāsañjñisamāpattisamāpannasyāsañjñike ca prādurbhūteniravaśeṣeṣu pravṛttivijñāneṣu niruddheṣu punarvyutthānakālaālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate
YXpsk:1475: na hisamāpatticittāt tasyotpattir yuktā tasya ciraniruddhatvānniruddhasya cāsattvāt asac ca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃpradhānātmādivat
YXpsk:1478: tathā hy akurvatkāritro 'nāgataḥkurvatkāritro vartamānaḥ uparatakāritro 'tīta ity ucyate
YXpsk:1479: evaṃtarhi kāritraṃ bhāvād anyad ityabhyupagantavyamatītānāgatāvasthayoḥkāritre 'saty api bhāvābhyupagamāt
YXpsk:1480: evaṃ ca kāritrasyaivotpādo vyayaś ca na bhāvānām abhūtvābhāvād bhūtvā cābhāvāt na carūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānānām sarvadāsvarūpādhyāsitatvāt
YXpsk:1481: tataś cotpādavyayābhāvān nirodhavannānityā rūpādayaḥ skandhāḥ syuḥ
YXpsk:1482: tataś ca duḥkhā api na syuḥ
YXpsk:1483: uktaṃ hi sūtre yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti
YXpsk:1484: evaṃ caskandhān anityato duḥkhataś ca cintayato viparyāsa evasyāt
YXpsk:1485: na ca viparyāsāt kleśaprahāṇaṃ yuktam anitye duḥkhe canityasukhaviparyāsavat
YXpsk:1486: kāritrasya cotpādavyayasambhavāt saṃskṛtatvam rūpādiṣu ca skandheṣusaṅgrahābhāvāt ṣaṣṭhaḥskandho 'bhyupagantavyaḥ
YXpsk:1487: na ca sāsravā dharmāupādānaskandhaiḥ sarve vā saṃskṛtāḥ skandhaiḥ saṅgṛhītā itivaktavyam
YXpsk:1488: anyaḥ punar āha kāritraṃ nāma phalaparigrahaḥ
YXpsk:1489: dharmo hi yasya dharmasya hetubhāvena vyavatiṣṭhatesa dharmas taṃdharmaṃ phalatvena gṛhṇātīty ato hetubhāvavyavasthānaṃbhāvānāṃ phalaparigrahaḥ
YXpsk:1490: hetubhāvena ca sa eva dharmo vyavatiṣṭhata itidharmebhyaḥ kāritram ananyat
YXpsk:1493: etad uktaṃ bhavati nānyat kāritraṃ dharmāt kiṃ tarhi dharma eva kāritram
YXpsk:1498: kāritrasya vā dharmasvarūpavad dharmād ananyatvāttraiyadhvakatvam abhyupagantavyam
YXpsk:1501: anyac cānyena kriyate na svātmanaivatasya kṛtatvāt
YXpsk:1506: tathā hi phalasya kāraṇavat pūrvameva pariniṣpannatvāt phalasya kiṃ kurvat kāraṇaṃ bhavatiakurvad vā kathaṃ kāraṇam
YXpsk:1507: phalam api tenākriyamāṇaṃkathaṃ tasya kāryaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1508: kāritrāṇām eva ca parasparatohetuphalabhāvaḥ na dharmāṇām
YXpsk:1510: na tu dharmasvarūpam nāpidharmasvarūpād dharmasvarūpam sarvadāstitvāt
YXpsk:1511: tathā cayasmin sati yad bhavati asati ca na bhavatitat tasya kāraṇamitarac ca kāryam
YXpsk:1513: evaṃ ca nadharmasvarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ na kāryam iti lokaśāstravirodhaḥ
YXpsk:1519: evaṃ tarhi yan na tatsvabhāvaṃ nānyasvabhāvam tac chaśaviṣāṇavan niḥsvabhāvatvān nāstyeveti
YXpsk:1522: tasmād anutpanno bhāvo 'nāgataḥ niruddho 'tītaḥutpannāniruddho vartamāna ity abhyupeyam
YXpsk:1523: na punar akurvatkāritro 'nāgataḥ kurvatkāritro vartamānaḥuparatakāritro 'tīta iti
YXpsk:1524: anyaḥ punar āha sendriyaṃ rūpaṃ cittaṃ cānyonyabījakamity ato nirodhāsañjñisamāpattibhyām asañjñikāc cavyuttiṣṭhataḥ sendriyād rūpāc cittam
YXpsk:1525: yathārūpyadhātoś cyavamānasya cittād eva ciraniruddham api sendriyaṃ rūpam utpadyata iti
YXpsk:1526: tasmān nātra kiñcid ālayavijñānena prayojanam iti
YXpsk:1527: evaṃ tarhy ekaikasya sattvasyadvau cittasantānau syātām
YXpsk:1530: tataś cāsya parinirvāṇam eva syād ityakalpaneyam
YXpsk:1531: ekaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ svasattādhyāsitaṃ nirīhamanityaṃ śaktaṃ ceṣyate na viparyāsāt
YXpsk:1532: tathā hy uktaṃbhagavatā asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādād idamutpadyate
YXpsk:1534: tasmān na nityohetuḥ nāpy asan na sadvyāpāro nāpy aśaktaiti
YXpsk:1535: ālayavijñānaṃhi sarvasaṃskṛtadharmabījānugatam ā maraṇāt santānavṛtticety ālayavijñānād evācittakāvasthāto vyuttiṣṭhataḥpravṛttivijñānam utpadyata
YXpsk:1536: sūtre ca nirodhasamāpannasyavijñānaṃ kāyād anapakrāntamity uktam
YXpsk:1537: na cālayavijñānādanyasya nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyāṃ vijñānasya kāyādanapakramo yujyate
YXpsk:1539: nirodhasamāpannasyālayavijñānād yadyanyavijñānasamudācāra iṣyate tataś catrayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥsparśaḥ sparśasahajā vedanā sañjñā cetaneti sūtre vacanātsañjñāvedanayor api samudācāro 'bhyupagantavyaḥ
YXpsk:1540: tataś cavedanāsañjñāsadbhāvāt sañjñāveditanirodha eva na syāt
YXpsk:1541: yo 'pimanyate sūtrevedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇāuktā na ca sarvā vedanātṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayaḥ
YXpsk:1542: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na sarvaḥsañjñāvedanāpratyaya iti nāyaṃ doṣaḥ
YXpsk:1544: viśeṣitā hivedanā sūtrāntare avidyāsaṃsparśajaṃ veditaṃpratītyotpannā tṛṣṇeti
YXpsk:1545: na tv evaṃ kvacit sparśo viśeṣita ity asamānam etat
YXpsk:1546: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānād evasarvabījakāt sarvāsv avasthāsu santānena vartamānānnirodhāsañjñisamāpattyāsañjñikebhyo vyutthānacittamutpadyata ity abhyupeyam
YXpsk:1550: ālambanapratyayaḥ pañcānāṃcakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayāḥmanovijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ
YXpsk:1555: prakārāntareṇa vṛttir ātmalābho'syavijñānasyeti tad vijñānaṃ prakārāntaravṛtti
YXpsk:1557: ālambanapratyayāpekṣā kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥprakārāntaravṛttitāyāḥ sālambanapratyayāpekṣā tādṛśīṃprakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya gṛhītvā pravṛttivijñānād anyadālayavijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānabījabhūtam astīti vijñāyate
YXpsk:1558: atrahi vijñānaṃ pratyavabhāsabhedāt parasparato bhidyate nasamanantarādhipatipratyayabhedāt
YXpsk:1559: ata etad evam uktam ālambanapratyayāpekṣāṃ prakārāntaravṛttitām upādāya
YXpsk:1560: sācaprakārāntaravṛttitā yathā nālambananirapekṣā yujyate tathāhetupratyayanirapekṣāpi naiva yujyate
YXpsk:1561: yaś ca yeṣāṃ bījairanugataḥ sa teṣāṃ hetupratyayaḥ
YXpsk:1562: na ca pravṛttivijñānānāṃparasparabījatvaṃ yujyate kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃhīnamadhyapraṇītadhātūnāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃsāsravānāsravāṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ paryāyeṇa bhāvāt
YXpsk:1563: na hitenaiva tasya vāsanā dṛṣṭā nāpy anyenabhinnakālenāsambaddhena vā kiṃ tarhi sahotpādavināśair evapuṣpādibhis tilādīnāṃ vāsanā dṛṣṭā
YXpsk:1564: ato vipākavāsanāvijñānena samakālaṃ tata evotpadyamānāninirudhyamānāni capravṛttivijñānāni svānurūpakāryotpādanasamarthaṃvipākavijñānaṃ kurvanti
YXpsk:1566: taiś ca prakārāntaravṛttibhiḥ pravṛttivijñānair vāsitādvipākavijñānāt punar apy ālambanāpekṣāṇi kuśalākuśalādiprakārāntaravṛttīni pravṛttivijñānāny utpadyantaity avaśyam abhyupagantavyam
YXpsk:1569: acittakamiddhamūrchādyavasthāsu cchinnepravṛttivijñānasantāne punar acittakamiddhamūrchāpagataālayavijñānam antareṇa pravṛttivijñānotpattir na yujyate
YXpsk:1572: pravṛttivijñānād anyad ālayavijñānam yannimittāsaṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca gamyate
YXpsk:1576: tatr ālay avij ñānā nabh yupa gamesaṃskārapratyayavijñānābhāvāt saṃsārapravṛttir na yujyate
YXpsk:1577: ālayavijñānānabhyupagame hi pratisandhivijñānaṃ vāsaṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥsaṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam
YXpsk:1578: tatra napratisandhivijñānaṃ pūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārapratyayampūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārāṇāṃciraniruddhatvāt niruddhasya cāsattvāt asataś ca pratyayābhāvāt
YXpsk:1579: yadi niruddhasyapratyayatvaṃ neṣyate evaṃ ca saty aphalam eva karma syātna hi vartamānāt karmaṇo vipāko nirvartate
YXpsk:1581: karmāhitāyāś cittasantāne vāsanāyāḥparipākaviśeṣaṃ gatāyā vipāko nirvartate
YXpsk:1582: tasmān na viphalaṃkarma na ca niruddhāt karmaṇo vipāka iti
YXpsk:1583: pratisandhau canāmarūpam eva na kevalaṃ vijñānam
YXpsk:1584: tatra vijñānam evasaṃskārapratyayam na ca nāmarūpam iti kātra yuktiḥ
YXpsk:1585: tasmāt saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vaktayam natu vijñānamiti
YXpsk:1588: tasya prātisandhikānnāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ napūrvam pūrvaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nottaram ity ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu
YXpsk:1593: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau ca nāmarūpamevety eṣaiva nītir niravadyā
YXpsk:1594: ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥsaṃskāraparibhāvitāḥ saṃskārapratyayam vijñānam ity ayamapi pakṣo durghaṭita eva
YXpsk:1596: na hi vijñānaṃvipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vātmany ādhātuṃsamartham ātmani kāritravirodhāt
YXpsk:1599: acittakāsu ca middhādyavasthāsupunaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasambhavādvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt
YXpsk:1607: ata evana dṛṣṭasatyānāṃ karmāṇi punarbhavam ākṣipantidarśanaprahātavyakleśābhāvāt
YXpsk:1609: tathā hitraidhātukavītarāgāṇām ākṣiptapunarbhavam api karmakleśābhāvād bhavībhavituṃ notsahate
YXpsk:1611: evaṃ ca pradhānatvāt kleśā evasaṃsārapravṛtter mūlam
YXpsk:1614: sammukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyeta bījāvastho vā
YXpsk:1615: tatrasammukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam tadātatprahāṇamārgābhāvāt
YXpsk:1616: bījāvastho 'pi naiva prahīyate na hipratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatrakleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃtatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta
YXpsk:1617: atha pratipakṣacittameva kleśabījānuṣaktam iṣyate na hi kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo yujyate
YXpsk:1618: nacāprahīṇakleśabījānāṃ saṃsāravinivṛttiḥsambhavatīti tasmādavaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūtaiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyatesvabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity upeyam
YXpsk:1619: punaś ca tata eva santatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃbhāvanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ pravartante
YXpsk:1621: tasmiṃś cāpanīte punastenāśrayeṇa kleśānām anutpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥprāpyate
YXpsk:1623: na hikarmavidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣusahakārikāraṇābhāvātpunarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃsamartham
YXpsk:1624: ata evālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś canānyathety avaśyam ālayavijñānam abhyupagantavyam
YXpsk:1634: athavālīyanta upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥkāryabhāvena tad vālīyata upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvenasarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ
YXpsk:1642: anye punar anyathā paṭhanti ātmamānālayanimittatāṃ copādāyeti
YXpsk:1651: ataḥ kāyapratibaddhavṛttitvāt tatkāye ālīnam iti kāyālīnam
YXpsk:1654: na kevalam ālayavijñānam etad ucyate kiṃ tarhyādānavijñānam apīti
YXpsk:1662: na cakṣurādivijñānānitatpṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ vā manovijñānam teṣāṃ tata ūrdhvaṃvartamānacakṣurādipratyayanimittatvāt
YXpsk:1663: na ca tatrānyanmanovijñānaṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ tasya kuśalākuśalatvāt
YXpsk:1667: api capratiniyatāśrayapravṛttatvāt ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃvicchedapravṛttatvāc ca na sarvasyāśrayasyopādānaṃprasajyate
YXpsk:1668: tathā hiyena yenāśrayeṇa yad vijñānaṃ pravartatesa eva tenopāttaḥ syāt avaśiṣṭasyānupāttatvaṃvijñānavirahitatvāt
YXpsk:1669: tathā cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicchedena punaḥ punaḥ pravartata ititadāśrayasya punaḥ punarupādānadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ
YXpsk:1670: tasmād ālayavijñānam evapratisandhau kāyam upādatte ā maraṇāc ca samastakāyāśrayeṇa pravartata iti tad eva rpratisandhibandhātprabhṛty ā maraṇāt kāyam upādātta ity ādānavijñānam ity ucyate
YXpsk:1673: kliṣṭaṃ hi mana ālayavijñānam ātmatvena nityam ālambateātmālambanair mohadṛṣṭimānasnehaiḥ samprayuktatvāt
YXpsk:1676: yat ṣaṇṇāṃ cakṣurādivijñānakāyānāṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānaṃ mana ity uktam tat ṣaṣṭhasyamanovijñānasyāśrayaprasiddhyartham na tumanyanākāratvāt
YXpsk:1680: atra tv ātmagrahaṇaṃ na mohamātreṇa samprayujyate kiṃtarhy ātmaniyo mohaḥ
YXpsk:1683: tasyāpratītatvāccaittānām api caittaiḥ samprayogāc catatsvarūpanirdhāraṇārtham āha vijñānam iti
YXpsk:1684: ekajātīyam iti kliṣṭajātīyam na kuśalam avyākṛtaṃ vānityam ātmamohādibhiś caturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ samprayuktatvāt
YXpsk:1685: santānānuvṛtti cety avicchedena vartata ity arthaḥ
YXpsk:1688: nira vaśe ṣatr aidh ātuk akli ṣṭad harm apra hīṇa tvāt
YXpsk:1693: atra ca mano nirvacanataālambanataḥ samprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataś ca nirdiṣṭaṃveditavyam
YXpsk:1700: āṃ rūpādīnāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatāmupādāya rūpādayaḥ skandhā uktāḥ
YXpsk:1701: y zyat kiñcid rūpam aatītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vāaudarikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vāntikesarvam aikadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandhaitisaṅkhyāṃ gacchatītyevaṃ yāvad vijñānam
YXpsk:1703: ādhyātmikā vā bāhyā veti santānabhedena yasmādādhyātmikāḥ svāsāntānikāḥ bāhyās tato 'nye
YXpsk:1708: hīnā vā praṇītā veti gatibhedena bhinnāḥ
YXpsk:1710: yad vādūre yad vāntika iti deśabhedena bhinnāḥ
YXpsk:1713: saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāyetydhva sant ānap rakā raga tide śabh edab hinn ānāṃrūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ pratyekaṃ saṅkṣepeṇasaṅgrahaḥ
YXpsk:1715: tāṃ saṅkṣepasaṅgrahatām upādāya sūtre rāśyarthaḥskandhārtho vijñāyate
YXpsk:1717: tat sarvam atītādikaṃrūpam ekadhyam abhisaṅkṣipya rūpaskandha itisaṅkhyāṃ gacchatīti
YXpsk:1727: rūpaskandhavibhāge yathā cakṣurādayaḥ svarūpato nirdiṣṭāḥtathehāpi svarūpatonirdeṣṭavyā iti
YXpsk:1728: tatra hy uktaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya varṇaviṣayo rūpaprasādaścakṣurindriyam iti
YXpsk:1732: pūrvaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaś cakṣuṣo viṣayovarṇaḥsaṃsthānaṃ vijñaptiś ca rūpam
YXpsk:1739: vijñānāni vijñānaskandhaḥ ṣaḍ pravṛttivijñānāniālayavijñānaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca manaḥ
YXpsk:1745: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu noktam ity atas tatprabhedabubhutsayā pṛcchati asaṃskṛtaṃ katamad iti
YXpsk:1754: sapratighaṃ rūpaṃ yatra pradeśe napratihanyatesa tasyāvakāśaḥ
YXpsk:1755: ato rūpiṇāṃ bhāvānāmavakāśadānād ākāśam ity ucyate
YXpsk:1756: ākāśānantaram uddiṣṭatvāt tann irde ś ānant aram evāpratisaṅkhyānirodhasvarūpāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ katama iti
YXpsk:1760: tad uktaṃ bhavati duḥkhādīnām āryasatyānāṃpratipratisaṅkhyānaṃ pratisaṅkhyā
YXpsk:1765: etad uktaṃ bhavati pratyayavaikalyādanāgatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ so'pratisaṅkhyānirodhaiti
YXpsk:1768: pratisaṅkhyānirodhasamāpattyupapattyanityatānirodheṣv apivartata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodhavyavacchedārtham āha na cavisaṃyoga iti
YXpsk:1769: saṃyogo hy anāgatair dharmair bīje sati teṣāmutpattidharmatām upādāya vyavasthāpyate
YXpsk:1770: tatpratipakṣeṇasvāśrayāt teṣāṃ bīje 'poddhṛte yo 'tyantam anutpādaḥ pratilabdha itiso 'py apratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ prāpnotīty ata āha sa punar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇa vinā skandhānām atyantam anutpāda iti
YXpsk:1772: bhavati ayaṃ hi saty apikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaskandhabījasadbhāvena vinā kleśapratipakṣeṇa labhyata iti pratisaṅkhyānirodha evāyamnāpratisaṅkhyānirodhaḥ
YXpsk:1773: evaṃ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣaś canirvāṇadhātuḥ pratisaṅkhyānirodha ity uktaṃ bhavati
YXpsk:1776: sahy anutpādobhavatina tv atyantam punaś cittacaittotpādasadbhāvāt
YXpsk:1778: anityatānirodho hi vartamānasyana ca vartamānasyānutpādo 'sti kiṃ tarhy anāgatasyaiveti
YXpsk:1779: tadyathaikarūpaprakāravyāsaktacakṣurvijñānasya yāni viṣayāntarāṇy utpattimanti rūpaprakārāntarāṇi catadālambanaiḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyair na śakyam utpattumvartamāneṣu samanantarapratyayābhāvāt atīteṣvālambanapratyayābhāvāt
YXpsk:1784: yo nirodhaiti sarvanirodhaprasaṅga ityāha sa cavisaṃyogaiti
YXpsk:1787: visaṃyogam eva nirūpayati sapunar yaḥ kleśapratipakṣeṇaskandhānāmatyantam anutpāda iti
YXpsk:1790: tatra yasyayasya yo yo mārgakṣaṇaḥ pratipakṣaḥ tasmin mārga utpannesa āśrayakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleśabījānugatamnantarasyāśrayasya kṣaṇāntaram utpādayituṃ na śaknotitadutpattiviruddhapratyayasānnidhyāt
YXpsk:1792: sa eva mārgakṣaṇas tatpraheyakleṣabījānugatasya kṣaṇāntarasyotpattaye viguṇaḥpratyayaḥitarasyānuguṇo veditavyaḥ
YXpsk:1793: evaṃ yāvadbhāvanāheyasyamṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya pratipakṣa utpanne sa āśrayoniravaśeṣatraidhātukadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyakleśabījavyāvṛ ttyātmakasyaiva kṣaṇāntarasya kāraṇībhavati
YXpsk:1794: evaṃ yasyayasya kleśasyāśrayāpravṛttito bījam uddhṛtaṃ bhavati tasyatasya tatsamprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃkleśapratipakṣeṇātyantam anutpādaḥ prāpto
YXpsk:1796: pratisaṅkhyānirodhād anantaraṃ tathatoddiṣṭety atastannirdeśānantaraṃ tathatāvabodhārthaṃ praśnaḥ tathatā
YXpsk:1802: dharmāṇāṃ kāryānityatādayo 'pi dharmatā vidyanta ity ata āha dharmanairātmyam iti
YXpsk:1803: dharmā hi yena rūpeṇajñānābhidhānayor viṣayībhavanti tat teṣām ātmā
YXpsk:1807: atra tu vicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃjāyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena prastutam evārabhyate
YXpsk:1810: parasparavibhinnarūpeṣv aviśeṣeṇa pravartata ity atas teṣu tenasāmānyam artham upādāya pravartitavyam sa ca na vijñāyataiti praśnaḥ kenārthenāyatananīti
YXpsk:1820: evaṃ yāvan mano dharmāś casasamprayogasya manovijñānasyāyadvāram
YXpsk:1821: āyatanānantaraṃ dhātavaḥ prabhedataḥ svarūpataś ca vaktavyāity ataḥ prabhedadarśanārtham āha aṣṭādaśa dhātava
YXpsk:1823: teṣām eva svarūpapradarśanārtham āha cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur evaṃ yāvanmanodhātur dharmadhātur
YXpsk:1825: atra hi rūpaskandhavibhāgeyāni cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanāni pañcendriyāṇy uktāni pañca ca rūpaśabdagandharasasparśāḥteṣāṃviṣayatvena
YXpsk:1826: āyatanavyavasthāyāṃ tāny eva pañcendriyāṇicakṣurādyāyatanatvenoktāni rūpādayaś ca viṣayārūpādyāyatanatvena
YXpsk:1827: dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ ta eva cakṣurdhāturyāvat kāyadhātuḥ rūpadhātur yāvat spraṣṭavyadhātur ityuktam ity ata āha tatra cakṣurādidhātavo
YXpsk:1829: dharmadhātus tu yad eva dharmāyatanaṃ vedanādayas trayaḥskandhā avijñaptir asaṃskṛtacatuṣṭayaṃ ca
YXpsk:1831: napunar evaṃdhātuvyavasthāyāṃ manaāyatanam evamanodhātuḥ kiṃ tarhi manaāyatanaṃ dhātuvyavasthāyāṃsapta cittadhātavaḥ
YXpsk:1840: manodhātuḥpunaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānavyatirikto na vidyate kiṃ tarhi ta evaṣaḍvijñānadhātavo 'nantaraniruddhā manodhātur ityucyate
YXpsk:1841: r snanv evaṃ saptadaśa dhātavaḥ prāpnuvanti dvādaśa vāmanodhātoḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ cā vijñānadhātūnām itaretarāntarbhāvāt
YXpsk:1847: tatra pañcendriyāṇi cakṣurādīni pañca viṣayā rūpādayaāyatanavyavasthāyāṃdaśāyatanāni dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ daśa dhātavaḥ
YXpsk:1853: rūpaskandhād vijñānaskandhāc ca trayovedanāsañjñāsaṃskārākhyāḥ skandhārūpaskandhapradeśaś cāvijñaptyākhyaḥ tedharmāyatanaṃ dharmadhātuś ca
YXpsk:1859: na hikṣaṇikānāṃ vyāpāraḥ sambhavatīti pūrvam evoktam
YXpsk:1860: ya eva dharmāḥ skandhā iti deśitāḥ ta eva punar āyatanatvenadhātutvena cety ataḥ pṛcchati kimarthaṃ
YXpsk:1862: sarvā hi deśanā bhagavatāṃbuddhānāṃ saprayojanā sattvārthapravṛttatvātkleśapratipakṣeṇa ca
YXpsk:1863: na cātra prayojanaṃ vijñāyate punaḥpunas teṣām eva dharmāṇām anyenānyena ca prakāreṇadeśanā iti kimarthaṃ skandhādideśaneti prayojanaṃvaktavyam ity ata āha trividhātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti
YXpsk:1864: tatra navijñāyatekatamas trividha ātmagrāhaḥ katamasya vāpratipakṣeṇa katamā deśanety ata āha yathākramaṃ
YXpsk:1868: sarve hy ātmavādinaevaṃ pratipannāḥ ya eva paśyati sa eva śṛṇoti jighraty āsvādayatispṛśati ceti
YXpsk:1869: tatra ya eva vedayate sa eva cetayate sañjānītevijānātīti
YXpsk:1870: na hi sattvātmabhāva evaṃ skandhavyatirikto 'nyaḥkaścid ekavyavasthitarūpo vidyatetatsvarūpakāryānupalabdheḥ
YXpsk:1872: cakṣur eva hi darśanākhyasya vijñānasyāsādhāraṇaṃkāraṇam āśrayaś cetidraṣṭṛtvenopacaryate
YXpsk:1875: sañjñaiva nimittodgrahaṇātmikatvāt sañjānītenānyaity evaṃ sarvatra vācyam
YXpsk:1878: ekatvagrāhe vyāvartiteskandhadeśanayā yas tatraikatvagrāhapūrvaka ātmagrāhaḥasāv api vyāvartita evety ataekatvagrāhapūrvātmagrāhapratipakṣeṇa
YXpsk:1879: ekatvagrāhas tu kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvātmagrāha ity uktaḥ
YXpsk:1880: bhoktṛgrāhaḥ punaḥ sarvavādināṃ yaḥ śubhāśubhasyakarmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanāprabhāvitaṃ phalamupabhuṅkte rūpaśabdādīṃś ca viṣayān sa
YXpsk:1884: tāṃ ṣaṭprakārām upalabdhimāyatanāny eva kurvanti nānyaḥ
YXpsk:1885: ata eva cakṣurādayorūpādayaś ca vijñānāyadvārārthenāyatanānīty ucyante
YXpsk:1886: tasmānnāsti kaścid anyaścakṣurādivyatirekeṇa karmaphalasyaviṣayāṇāṃ copabhoktety evam āyatanadeśanābhoktṛtvagrāhapratipakṣeṇeti
YXpsk:1887: kartṛtvagrāhaḥ punar yaḥśubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā valganāsphoṭanādīnāṃ casaātmā
YXpsk:1890: evaṃkāraṇaṃ sattāmātreṇa kāryotpattiṃ prati vyāpriyate kāryaṃca sattāmātreṇaiva kāraṇam apekṣate
YXpsk:1891: na cakāryakāraṇasvarūpavyatirekeṇānyā kriyāsti tat pūrvam evapratipāditam
YXpsk:1894: idānīṃ dharmapravicayānugrahārthaṃ ya evaskandhāyatanadhātutvena dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ teṣām evaprakārāś cintyante
YXpsk:1895: tatra dhātuṣu rūpacittayor vibhaktatvenavistarāpadeśāt sāsravaprakārādīnāṃ sukhagamyo nirdeśa iti dhātūn evārabhya cintyate na skandhāyatanānity ata evāha aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati rūpiṇa ityādi
YXpsk:1896: rūpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ tad eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ
YXpsk:1897: āśrayāśritaṃ rūpaṃ vā yathāsambhavam eṣām astīti rūpiṇaḥ
YXpsk:1898: na ca cakṣurādivijñāneṣuprasaṅgaḥ cakṣurādīnām ādhāratvena teṣām anāśrayatvāt
YXpsk:1902: avijñaptirūpe saty api na dharmadhātorūpitvaprasaṅgas tasyāśrayāśritarūpābhāvād rūpaṇābhāvādrūpaskandhāsaṅgrahāc ca
YXpsk:1916: ekasyaiva rūpadhātoḥ sanidarśanatvena parigrahātśeṣāḥsaptadaśa cakṣurādidhātavaḥ pañca śabdādidhātavaś catvārodharmadhātur ekaḥ sapta cittadhātavaḥ anidarśanā itisiddham
YXpsk:1920: dharmadhātāv apyavijñaptirūpasadbhāvād asti rūpivyapadeśa itidaśety āha
YXpsk:1926: iha tv āvaraṇapratighātenaiva sapratighatvam iṣṭam itipratipādayann āha yatra yaś ca pratihanyata iti
YXpsk:1928: evaṃca yenānyasya svadeśa utpattiḥ pratibadhyate yasya ca pratibadhyate tadubhayam api sapratigham iti jñāpitaṃbhavati
YXpsk:1929: etena ca daśa rūpiṇo dhātavaḥparasparasya svadeśautpattiṃ pratibadhnantīty āvaraṇapratighātena sapratighāḥśeṣāḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātuś cāpratighāiti
YXpsk:1936: pañcendriyadhātavo rūpādayaḥpañca viṣayadhātavaḥ pañcacakṣurādivijñānadhātavaś ca ete pañcadaśaekāntena sāsravāeva
YXpsk:1937: ādyāapi trayo vidyante cakṣūrūpacakṣurvijñānadhātavaity ata āha paścimānām iti
YXpsk:1939: teṣām api bhāgo 'ṃśaḥsāsravaḥ na tu cakṣurādivat sarva eva sāsravāḥ
YXpsk:1940: teṣāṃ punaryo namārgasatyāsaṃskṛtasvabhāvo bhāgaḥsa eva sāsravaḥ
YXpsk:1945: nocyate cakṣurādivijñānair eva saha rūpādiṣukleśā utpadyanta itikiṃ tarhi pratyakṣagocaratāmupādāya rūpādiṣu kleśotpattir ucyate
YXpsk:1946: tathā hi cakṣuś capratītya rūpāṇi ca pratītya cakṣurvijñānam utpadyatecakṣurvijñānānubhūtāni rūpāṇi manovijñānena vikalpyantevikalpāc ca kleśā utpadyante iti
YXpsk:1955: pañca rūpādayo viṣayāḥ kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ
YXpsk:1958: athavākāmadhātupratisaṃyuktā iti vaktavye dhātuśabdalopātkāmapratisaṃyuktā ity uktāḥ
YXpsk:1961: te punaḥsarve ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥṣaḍ viṣayadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātavaś ca
YXpsk:1965: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaindriyadhātavaḥ catvāroviṣayadhātavaḥ tadviṣayavijñānadhātavaś catvāraḥ ete caturdaśa rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktāḥ
YXpsk:1966: kim punaḥ kāraṇaṃgandharasayo rūpadhātau na bhāvas tadvijñānayoś ca
YXpsk:1967: gandharasau hy ekāntenakavaḍīkārāhārasvabhāvāv evana tu sparśavedanāhārasvabhāvau
YXpsk:1968: api cakavaḍīkārāhāravītarāgāś ca rūpadhātāv upapadyanteyadvītarāgāś ca yatropapadyante tatra tasyābhāvaḥ tadyathārūpavītarāgāṇām ārūpyāpattau
YXpsk:1975: atas tatra daśarūpasvabhāvā dhātavas tadāśrayālambanāś ca pañcavijñānadhātavo na santi
YXpsk:1987: tatra kutsitāc chalitam iti kuśalam gatam ityarthaḥ
YXpsk:1991: kutsitena vākāreṇa śerata itikuśāḥ chedakā vedhakāś ceti
YXpsk:1993: yaśchedanavedhanaparihāreṇa kuśān ādatte sa kuśala ity ucyate
YXpsk:1994: evam anyo 'pi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ praśaṃsām arhati sa kuśalastatrocyate
YXpsk:1998: iti kuśalā apy akuśalā apy avyākṛtā api
YXpsk:1999: te tu na vijñāyantaaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ katame daśety āha saptacittadhātavor srūpaśabdadharmadhātavaśceti
YXpsk:2000: atra cittadhātūnāṃ samprayogataḥ kuśalākuśalatvam na svataḥ kuśalākuśalamūlānāṃ ceti
YXpsk:2011: ete hyavyākṛtāevapara mārt hasv abhā vasa mpra yo gasamutth ānat a ḥkuśalākuśalatvābhāvāt
YXpsk:2016: te tu na prajñāyante katamedvādaśety āha rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhāt
YXpsk:2018: śeṣāḥṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍvijñānadhātava ity ete dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ
YXpsk:2021: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ata āha
YXpsk:2035: cittam eva caittānām āśraya iti cittam evātmatvenopacaryate
YXpsk:2036: kathaṃ punar etad gamyate 'trātmatvena cittam abhipretam iti
YXpsk:2037: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnotipaṇḍitaiti
YXpsk:2038: cittasya cānyatra damanam uktam cittasyadamanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvahamiti
YXpsk:2039: atra hi cittasyadamanaṃ cittam eva dāntaṃ sukhāvaham ity uktam
YXpsk:2040: ato 'trāpy ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti cittamevābhipretam iti vijñāyate
YXpsk:2043: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti nahy ete manodhātutvam aprāptāś cittasyāśrayībhavantīti
YXpsk:2044: yadātadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātivartantaiti
YXpsk:2047: te 'pi na jñāyante katamesaptety ata āha cittadhātavaiti
YXpsk:2050: caśabdaḥ samuccaye sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaś ca sālambana iti
YXpsk:2057: pañcendriyadhātavaś cakṣurādayaḥ pañca viṣayadhātavorūpādayo dharmadhātupradeśaś cayo nacaitasikasvabhāvaḥ
YXpsk:2063: hy abhinirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpābhyāṃ samprayuktau tāveva vikalpakau netarau tābhyām asamprayogāt
YXpsk:2065: tatrānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ smṛtir eva mānasy anub hūtā lamb anās ampr amoṣ ākār ā
YXpsk:2066: traiyadhvikaparokṣārthābhyūhanākāra idam evaṃ naivam itiprajñāviśeṣaś cetanā vā 'bhirūpaṇāvikalpaḥ
YXpsk:2080: satyaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ tatra hyatītānāgatā anupāttāuktāḥ te ca na santy eva
YXpsk:2082: vartamānās tusvasattādhyāsitatvāt cittacaittaiś copāttatvād upāttā evacakṣurādayaḥ nānupāttāḥ
YXpsk:2084: na kiṃ tarhi caturṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ
YXpsk:2085: katameṣāṃcaturṇām ity atra āha rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyānām iti
YXpsk:2098: sa punar yaindriyāvinirbhāgavartinaṃ bhāgaṃ sthāpayitvā mūlavarjyeṣu keśaromādiṣu vartate
YXpsk:2104: teṣāṃ na vijñāyate katamepañcetyata āha rūpiṇaiti te punaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanadhātavaḥ
YXpsk:2105: kasya sabhāgāḥ kena prakāreṇa sabhāgā iti na vijñāyate ata āha svavijñānair viṣayasāmānyatām upādāyeti
YXpsk:2107: tena svavijñānena cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa samānam
YXpsk:2109: sāmānyatāmupādāyeti gṛhītvā cakṣuḥ svaviṣayeṇa rūpeṇa sabhāgam ucyate
YXpsk:2110: evaṃ śrotrādīnām api svaviṣayaiḥ sabhāgatā vaktavyā
YXpsk:2111: etaduktaṃ bhavati ye cakṣurādayaḥ svavijñānair adhyāsitāḥ tesabhāgāḥ
YXpsk:2114: kimarthaṃ punas te tatsabhāgā ity ucyante
YXpsk:2117: cakṣurādayas te sabhāgānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurādijātyāsamānā iti taiḥ sadṛśatvāt tatsabhāgā ity ucyante
YXpsk:2118: ete hyasādhāraṇatvād ya ekasya sabhāgās tatsabhāgā vā tesarvasattvānām apīti niyatam eṣāṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgatvam
YXpsk:2120: na ca vijñānād anyat kāritram astīti nānyeṣāṃsabhāgatatsabhāgatvam uktam
YXpsk:2123: ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat teṣāñ ca yonirodha evaṃ dī maśramaṇaḥya dharmmo yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinaḥśākyabhikṣuvibhūtiśrimitrasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatvācāryopādhyāyamātā
